column39: Please Grant My Dad Patrick Davis Clemency, 49 Year Sentence for Police Dog Death
column46: To: The Honorable Govenor Ralph Northam: Please Grant My Dad Patrick Davis Clemency, 49 Year Sentence for Police Dog Death
column47:
My name is Ladajah Washington, 23, and here is my plea to the Governor of Virginia, Ralph Northam, to take a FAIR look at this case of my father, Patrick Davis, and grant him Clemency or a Commuted sentence for the wrongful conviction of robbery and shooting a Police Dog. My family and I need your 1000 signatures, to help FREE a man who has already unjustly served 17 years in jail. People are getting less time for.. Murder..these days, like Amber Guyger, the former Dallas Police officer, who only got 10 years, for the cold blooded murder of Botham Jean, an innocent man. He was sitting at his table eating a bowl of ice cream. She claimed that she thought he was in her apartment. She'll be out in 5 years. This is such a travesty of justice. https://www.bing.com/videos/search?q=dallas+former+police+officer+verdict&view=detail&mid=F98C023CEF5DB4E4BC51F98C023CEF5DB4E4BC51&FORM=VIRE

*** In The Wrong Place at the Wrong Time.

My Dad, Patrick Davis, says he was leaving a party on foot around 4am, in the Ocean View area, of Norfolk, VA, when he saw acquaintances, James Davis (no relation) and Jermaine Fulford, ride past and flagged them down for a ride, on his way to a female friends apartment down the street. Once there, Patrick went upstairs in her apartment to confirm that he could stay, then ran back downstairs a few minutes later to inform his ride they could leave. Patrick, noticed the car wasn't parked where they let him out. As he looked around, he now sees, James Davis, running wildly past him saying, “RUN THEY SHOOTING”, so Pat ran too. Little did he know it was the police in pursuit of James Davis, who they rolled up on, at the tail end of  him robbing Henry Chatman. Patrick ran as James ran. James jumped into the driver’s seat. Jermaine Fulford, who had rummaged through Chatman's car, had already made it to the back seat.

*** Officer Nowell's Weapon Fired 9 Times! Forensics and Ballistics Proof Withheld. Faro Cremated With No Official Exam Report!

Patrick, jumped in the passenger’s window of the car, not realizing a K-9 cop, Jerry Nowell, was in pursuit of his friends. Officer Jerry Nowell, claims he was shot at 3 times by Patrick, who was running away from him. How did Patrick shoot at Nowell if he was running away? Nowell, says he released Faro, his K-9, who caught Patrick and bit him on the leg and pulled him from the moving car to the ground. Officer Nowell claims he heard a muffled shot and Faro was hit in the chest. Nowell, then shot and hit Patrick in the foot. Officer Loosee, arrived with his K-9 and let his dog go who chewed on Patrick while he was on the ground in handcuffs.

Officer Nowell, in his NPD Forensic Unit Report, verified by Investigator M.Heckman, says that he fired his weapon... get this....9 TIMES!! Now if 1 bullet, hit Patrick in the foot, where did the other 8 bullets go? It was very likely that Nowell hit his own dog who was in the line of fire. Officer Loosee, says in court that when he arrived on the scene and was standing by Nowell, but he never saw a gun on Patrick Davis. Their testimonies grossly conflicted.

So, its very possible that the officers in order to save face, planted the gun and blamed the dog shooting on Patrick. This Forensic evidence was never entered into court by the District Attorney. A Ballistics examination of Patrick showed no gun residue on either left or right hand. No dog blood splatter on his clothes and the bullet that shot and killed Faro was never dug out of his body for evidence. They cremated his body immediately, destroying all the evidence. It was only Officer Nowells, word that Faro had a bullet entrance in his chest and went out his belly.

*** James Davis, Pleaded GUILTY to ALL Charges of Robbery and Abduction

During the trial, the victim, Henry Chatman, confirmed that it was James Davis, NOT Patrick Davis, who approached him, held a gun to his head, robbed him of his money, and ordered him to take off his shoes and get under his own car. Chatman, only seeing the feet of the other suspect, as he was under the car. The rummaging thru the car, was most likely, Jermaine Fulford. For the sake of argument, lets say Patrick Davis was the one rummaging, he still wasn't the robber or abductor. Even after James Davis, PLEADED GUILTY TO ALL CHARGES and Henry Chatman, THE VICTIM, SAID IT WAS JAMES DAVIS! So, why did the Judge still give Patrick Davis, 20 years for abduction? James Davis, was given 8 years in prison, but served only 4 years, and is now a FREE man. James Davis, admitted being the architect and perpetrator, of this spur-of-the-moment crime of opportunity, that now has another man serving 49 years in prison. That's not fair or justice.

*** Not Given A Choice of Jury of His Peers Trial, But Tried by A Panel of 3 Judges!

It’s a travesty for any man to lose his freedom, when so many facts that were suppressed would have raised a clear case of reasonable doubt, that would have cleared him in trial by an impartial Jury of his peers. Patrick said he was never given the option to be tried by Jury. The court elected to try him by a panel of 3 Judges. This was a violation of his 6th Amendment Rights. His fate was decided for him by those who played judge, jury and executioner, who all have coincidentally retired since.

*** A Norfolk Deputy Sheriff of 20 Years, Indicted on Federal Bribery Charges.

The Norfolk PD has been known as a Good-Old-Boy network for years. Recently, a Deputy Sheriff, Bod McCabe, for over 2 decades, was indicted on federal bribery, mail fraud, and money laundering charges. https://www.pilotonline.com/news/crime/vp-nw-norfolk-sheriff-mccabe-indicted-20191024-t544x7awrra4vbd6j5dzustmfe-story.html   Patrick's Defense Attorney, didn't object to certain evidence brought up in court, and he didn't call on key witnesses that would have cleared Patrick on abduction and robbery charges. So, his Lawyer refused to represent him properly, and it’s not hard to conceive the police planting evidence (the gun) in attempt to cover up the fact that Officer Nowells’, bullet hit and killed poor Faro. 

*** Kids Lives Impacted. I was 6 When My Dad was Arrested. I’ll be 42 When he is released in 2038

My sister, brother, and I have spent all of our childhood, teenage and formative years without our Dad. However, by the grace of God, and the guidance of my grandmother, Patricia Davis,  I have gone on to graduate Granby High School, and have also recently graduated from the Mid-Atlantic Maritime Academy, and am on my way to a career with travel giant, Norwegian Cruise Lines. My brother, Raveon, is a talented smart 17 year old who cries for his dad to be in his life. He has a 4.0 grade point average and is getting letters from every major college in the country. His daughter Patra 21, has a 3 year old granddaughter, who needs him too.

*** Patrick's Mother Dies. Not Allowed To Attend Service

Another sad blow - Patrick was denied attending his mom’s funeral, by Officials at Baskerville Correctional Facility. This was so wrong to be locked up for something you didn't do and now to lose your mother, and not be allowed to attend the funeral.

We Need Your 1000 Signatures in 30 Days!

We need YOU, the general public, to review the facts, and sign our petition, so that Governor Northam will take a serious look at the blatant legal missteps used to convict my Dad.  

I know my Dad’s past, as a teen, before this incident was not perfect, as he was no stranger to the DAs office. Patrick, was a product of his environment. Having no positive male role models, he became caught up in the streets, trying to make money, and dealing drugs, to help feed his mom, brothers and sisters. Having this past, it seems he became a easy target for the prosecutor’s office, just being in the wrong place at the wrong time. Now they were trying him based on his past and not the FACTS. In his adult years, he was starting to put his life in order. He was a Father of 3, and he was trying to go straight. Then this happened.  

We encourage you to Sign This Petition to Free Patrick Davis, and give a $2 Donation to help us get this in front of the Governor so that he can look at the facts.

Ladajah can be reached at 804-721-5098. Lisa Woodhouse, Patrick’s fiancé, who handles his business, can be reached at 757-535-6482.  Thank you once again for your signatures and donations.

column39: Justice for Amber Issac by Ending Systematic Racism in the Healthcare System.
column46: Andrew M. Cuomo: JUSTICE FOR AMBER ISSAC
column47:
Amber Issac had told the doctors she could feel that something was wrong before and during her child birth. She had made a tweet afterwards stating that she was going to write a book exposing how black women are treated by the healthcare system. Less than four days later, she had died after a C-section went wrong. 

The husband Bruce McIntyre III continues to speak out about how rude and discriminatory the staff acted towards Amber, and went on to say “All of this was 100% preventable. All of it.” and “I feel like she would have got more attentive care if she was a white mother.” 

Black women are up to 8x more likely to die from birthing complications.

Let’s let Amber be the change within the systematic racism in the healthcare system, and to get justice for her husband and son.
column48: Andrew M. Cuomo, Charles E. Schumer, Kirsten E. Gillibrand, New York State House, New York State Senate, New York, New York Times, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez
column49:
The racial injustice within the health care system has gone on too long. Amber Rose Isaac should be the last story to be heard of the staggering rate of maternal mortality among black women. Amber had tweeted just a couple days before her death on April 21, ¨Can´t wait to a tell all about my experience during my last two trimesters dealing with incompetent doctors at Montefiore. ¨ The hospital had begun neglecting her since late January by ignoring her emails and pleas and disregarding her dropping platelets. The doctors failed to notice that she developed HELLP syndrome until the day of her death. Her partner, Bruce McIntyre is coming forward to talk about the complaints of black women being neglected. Doctors and nurses do not listen to their cries of help, or concerns. Amber Isaac voiced her concerns of not making it through the pregnancy and it went unheard. She is not the only victim. According to researchers from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Black American women are two-three times more likely to die from pregnancy related causes than white women. Most of them being preventable. There needs to be change, and fast. We will not tolerate anymore.  

Hold your doctors and nurses accountable to do their job. Teach medical students the right information, and to correct their oppressive beliefs that black persons do not feel pain/feel pain the same as their white counterparts.

column39: Remove Amber Heard and Robbie Margot from Pirates of the Carribean fran chise
column46: Movie goers and supporters of Johnny Depp: Remove Amber Heard and Robbie Margot from Pirates of the Carribean fran chise
column47:
A franchise to be successful has to be given great character indepth. Johnny Depp has given great justice and character to Capt Jack Sparrow -the franchise of the Pirates of the Carribean is nothing without Capt Jack Sparrow. 

No harm with putting strong women characters as this has been the legacy of the franchise, but to reboot and remove the main protagonist by replacing them with an all-woman cast, and with Amber Heard no doubt, is adding insult to injury to a growing cult classic. She has sullief already JD's legacy in Hollywood-to further kill the iconic characters that he has helped build is overkill in her mission to ruin JD. 

Do not kill off the franchise by putting her in it-as well as with any actor supporting Amber Heard

column39: Establish a Select Committee to investigate adequacy of provision for ME sufferers
column46: Tynwald: Establish a Select Committee to investigate adequacy of provision for ME sufferers
column47:
Myalgic Encephalomyelitis (M.E.) is a long-term, debilitating, multi-system disease which affects an estimated 300 men, women and children in the Isle of Man, 250,000 people in the UK, and around 15-30 million people worldwide. The economic cost of M.E. in the UK is at least £3.3 billion per year.

Average quality of life is lowest among all diseases tested. 75-85% of patients are not able to work and 25% are bedbound or housebound and unable to properly care for themselves or even wash properly, sometimes for many years at a time. Severe patients have extreme sensory sensitivity and may need to be tube fed. Recovery is rare, estimated at just 5%, leaving many patients sick and disabled for the rest of their lives.

From 2006-2015 M.E. had £4 per patient per year spent on research funding, a small percentage of which had a biomedical focus. In comparison, MS patients had £80 per patient per year. M.E. is twice as common as MS.

Graded Exercise Therapy (GET) is harming people with M.E. Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) is ineffective.

GPs receive little to no training about M.E. Current continuing professional development courses are outdated and inaccurate.

M.E. is the leading cause of long-term school sickness absence in the UK. 1 in 5 families of children with M.E. are subjected to unjustified child protection proceedings.

The 2014, the M.E. Time to deliver survey report found that:
• 96% of respondents with severe M.E. said they had stopped or reduced household tasks
• 95% had stopped or reduced social contact
• 74% require full or part-time care
• 70% were no longer able to leave their home independently
• 67% said a better informed GP would make a real difference to their healthcare and that they wanted more effective medication (67%), home visits (63%) and joined up health and social care (53%).

In March 2019, The Rt Hon Amber Rudd MP, the UK Work and Pensions Secretary, announced that they have stopped requiring the reassessment of those with the most severe conditions. Those whose needs are unlikely to decrease now receive an ongoing award – with only a light touch review a decade later. The Isle of Man should move from the current system of a very detailed and stressful 3 year reapplication process to acknowledge people with the greatest health difficulties and treat them in a way that respects our circumstances.

The local M.E. patient self-support group, ME Support Isle of Man (est. 1988), continues to campaign actively for a commissioned M.E. service that can educate and reduce harm and suffering but ignorance, stigma and neglect continue to be heaped upon a group of very vulnerable patients already suffering greatly.

It is the severe nature of the illness that makes it practically impossible for people with M.E. to make themselves heard and grasp the help they need. It is only because of the love and support of my family that my words can reach you today. I pray that you hear them.

Tynwald, the Isle of Man parliament, should establish a Select Committee to investigate and report on the adequacy of diagnosis, treatment and provision for ME sufferers.

column39: CHILD PEDOPHILES NEED LIFE SENTENCES
column46: Michelle Obama: CHILD PEDOPHILES NEED LIFE SENTENCES
column47:
Hello, My name is Deloris Ann Miller.

About a year ago my youngest daughter enjoyed visiting with her father on the weekends. Till one month she started making excuses, she wanted to stay with friends...next weekend... another friend...and so on. Finding this odd, because she loved to visit her dad. You see her daddy started dating a new woman... with 5 kids. Unfortunately, the oldest boy took a liking to Amber. The kind she didn't understand. He would hug her differently, talk to her differently. She was so ashamed till this day she won't tell her own mother what truly happened.  Luckily because I am a nosy mom. I found Facebook messages from this older son. First they seem like a normal conversation, then as i read on they went on to extremely disturbing. This 19 year old boy was testing the waters with my 12 year old daughter... SEXUALLY!!!! What do i do??? I call her dad, i call the police, the cac, the cps, the doctor. When I tried to put him where he belongs I was told there is not enough evidence against him.WHAT!?!? Well this mom waits a year and puts on her own sting. Yes I created a fake facebook of A fourteen year old girl. Got me plenty of friends, then started to talk to the now 20 year old. May I add i made it clear i was "only 14". It didn't take long before pictures of his privates started rolling in. I didn't even have to ask. In less then 24 hours I had enough evidence to show my local State police. The kind Officer graciously spoke to me. Heard my whole story, my confession on my fake profile. He read all the messages. Two days later the 20 year old is in jail!!! God is good!! My only thing is, is a small sentence is too good for someone who ruined my child. She will always be scared and scarred for life.Why wont he get life?

column36: ['Johnny Depp to replace <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> as Mera in Aquaman 2']
column39: Johnny Depp to replace Amber Heard as Mera in Aquaman 2
column46: Warner Brothers: Johnny Depp to replace Amber Heard as Mera in Aquaman 2
column47:
We the consumer public would like to make known the gross injustice forwarded to Johnny Depp in a modern day where not only should a person be rewarded by the merit of their craft and labour but also discourage the support of foul people who would benefit from further abuse to his person, career and general livelihood especially as it stands against the wants and interests of the people they intend to market to.

First point to be made: Johnny Depp is without hessitation or doubt the far superior actor/artist and would be by far the better investment by Warner Brothers to be cast in many of their productions. With faith in his craft going as far as to cast him in a female role that is ultimately reserved for a little more than eye candy and would still prove to be a fitting and rational choice for the role.

Family appeal: Depp has consistently been an inspiration and role model for many people over his extensively successful career and character portrayals where very few can call into question his integrity and generous nature while even the few who have HAVE BEEN PROVEN WRONG. With Depp himself still being empathetic and remorseful of his own contributions to toxic situations where he ultimately was the victim (seriously bless this guy). Achknowledging his own struggles and shortcummings while endeavoring to be a good and better person.

Lastly: Nobody with good conscience or sense could comfortably (with full knowledge) place preference or priority toward a representative who irreparably tarnishes their brand with their recent proven abusive and violent behaviours. 

More may very well be said on the circumstances behind this choice but ultimately signing here would give voice to the disgust in Amber Heards actions and acting ability by agreeing that we the consumer public not only stand with Johnny Depp in acknowledgement of his current circumstances but also believe that his superior skill in their craft would allow him to perform her roles successfully.

Thank you.

(Please remember to add a caption when sharing as the message sometimes gets missed... Leaving you with a pitcure of johnny in drag, its great but details help)
column49:
Johnny Depp to replace Amber Heard as Mera in Aquaman 2 as support for superior acting and denouncing DV.

The recent decision to drop Mr Depp from the fantastic beasts series while continuing affiliations with his abuser amber heard is making the moral stance of Warner Brothers abundantly clear and will leave a scar on your reputation. 

You have the choice to show that you have a strong stance for family values and human rights by denouncing domestic violence in a way that makes it clear that you care about your public.

The consumer community is very clear that not only do they support the ethical highground on modern issues but appreciate gestures of integrity and humour.

Johnny Depp cast as Mera will achieve not only establishing the moral stance of the studio but add a quirk into the franshice that fans will appreciate and remember.

Arguably it would benefit everyone both ethically and financially to take the risk to cast a beloved all around favourite over someone whose condemnable actions are well known to the public in a way that shows how much you value the fans

column33: Victims of stalkers to be informed the date of their stalkers release from prison
column35: [' have our voices <mark>heard</mark> and I would be so grateful if you would sign my heartfelt petition.\xa0 Thank you.\xa0\n\xa0']
column39: Victims of stalkers to be informed the date of their stalkers release from prison
column46: Amber Rudd MP: Victims of stalkers to be informed the date of their stalkers release from prison
column47:
My name is Lorraine Mitchell. 


My stalking ordeal began back in the summer of 2007.

Unlike the majority of stalking cases. The man who stalked me for 10 years was a stranger to me. Until he first approached me outside my work , I had never seen him before. I had no idea his name or where he lived. However he knew everything about me.
He stopped me just as i got into my car and asked me out on a date. When  I refused, he kept insisting and when i was about to drive off, he disclosed that he had been following me for 2 years ..he knew my name, my address, the names of my 3 children, he knew i had been divorced a year and that i was seeing someone.


For the next 10 years, I lived in fear of my life from this man who would not leave me alone. He would follow me in his car, stop me on my dog walks,  send me inappropriate messages on social media , even when i blocked him he would set up a new profile.. differant name but same photograph. Every time i rejected him, my car tyres got let down, my car was moved, my beloved cat was killed , and then later dug up and was decapitated.  He he even followed me in his car to the police station when i went to ask for help! When he was brought in for questioning,  and released he was told to stay away from me. But he continued to stalk me, and then also much to my despair started to follow my daughter. 

Even though i reported him to the police, the police did not take me seriously until  July 2017. Finally in August he was arrested and charged with stalking under section 4a ( fear of violence). He was sentanced by Judge Paul Tain to 4 years in prison.Judge Tain said it was one of the 'worst cases of its kind.'

 The last 2 years , I have felt safe,  but have flown by and the man who stalked me will be released into the public this August. Only a couple of weeks away. I have been told by the probation department that I am not allowed to know the day of his release, until the day he is released.  On the day of his release I will be phoned by the probation and it I will be informed that he has been released into the public. I will also then be told of only the conditions of his release, which apply specifically to me. I have been informed by the probation office that it is not their policy to inform victims of the exact date of their perpetrators release from prison in order to protect the perpetrator!

This means every day in August,  I will wake up thinking, " Is this the day he will be released?" I cannot plan holidays in August now, as I do not want to leave my adult son at home, incase the stalker turns up. Stalking is about power and control, and once again this man has control over me. I feel that victims needs should be taken into consideration when perpetrators are released. Especially victims of stalkers. Why are his needs so more important than mine? 

Once I know what date he is going to be released I can then prepare myself. In the past he has repeatedly broken restraining orders carrying weapons. I believe he still poses a significant risk to me, my family and my pets. I have realised also, that I am not alone in this horrendous situation.  All victims of crime are not allowed to know the date of their perpetrators release. As Stalking is about obsession, fixation and is relentless  and no treatment has been found to cure this,  I am petitioning that all victims of stalking and domestic abuse are given the date of their perpetrators release into the public. This is so that victims can prepare themselves and keep themselves safe.

I have since received an apology from Sussex Police and have been ask to speak at Police training days on stalking. However on hearing other victims stories,  I feel changes are needed which could prevent lives been lost and damaged.  Stalking is about Power and Control. Victims have their lives totally controlled by these awful perpetrators. Please help me to have our voices heard and I would be so grateful if you would sign my heartfelt petition.  Thank you.

column148: I am aged 54, and work as a therapist. I am divorced and have 1 daughter and 2 sons. I am a animal lover and have taken on a rescue dog, who was abandoned in the streets. He is adorable, and has been my life saver.

column33: Mask Choice for Round Rock ISD
column35: ['Now is the time to let your voices be <mark>heard</mark>! Sign this petition for the Round Rock ISD Board of']
column39: Mask Choice for Round Rock ISD
column46: Round Rock ISD Board Members: Mask Choice for Round Rock ISD
column47:
Now is the time to let your voices be heard! Sign this petition for the Round Rock ISD Board of Trustees for Freedom of Mask Choice for Students and Faculty of Round Rock ISD. 

A Vote will be held at the School Board meeting scheduled for 4/15/2021 to address this pressing issue which has been delegated to each School District’s School Board to decide.

On Thursday 4/8/21 The city of Round Rock unanimously voted to remove the city mask mandate. The Governor removed the state-wide mask mandate over a month ago and the covid numbers and hospitalizations are the lowest they have been since last June.

Over 90 Texas School Districts have already voted to remove their mask mandates for faculty and students.  It is time for Round Rock ISD to take a similar stance.

We respectfully support each individual’s right to choose and simply ask for your support in allowing each Student/Parent/Guardian to make the best decision in the interest of their own health. 

Thank you for your support!

column39: Answers & Justice 4 Kayla 2-11-21
column46: Kayla’s Law 21121 - Improving response times for missing adults
column47:
Support Kayla’s Law 21121

  • This investigation doesn’t make sense! Please help get victims family the answers they need !! 


Kayla, 29, was reported missing by her mother, Belinda, on November 28, 2020.After being unable to contact Kayla, Belinda immediately knew that something was wrong and Kayla was likely in danger, because she would never have left her children behind or let her mother know if she was planning to be away for a significant amount of time.

On December 3, 2020 police located Kayla’s car at the residence of Dowan Knighten, a convicted criminal, at the time on probation, and retrieved her car keys from him.For reasons that have never been made clear to the family, authorities elected not to conduct a search of KNIGHTEN’s residence in December. 

Nearly three months went by without any additional leads in the case. Finally, on February 11, 2021, authorities obtained a warrant to search KNIGHTEN’s residence. That night, at 8 PM, they discovered Kayla’s remains in the backyard. Knighten was arrested at the scene and is currently charged with mutilation of a dead body, concealing the death of an individual, and tampering with evidence.

Kayla’s family spent these months in agony, waiting to hear from the investigators. As Kayla’s child’s birthday,Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year’s passed, her family dreaded the call with each passing day. Belinda did everything in her power and kept in touch with law-enforcement, without many results. 

A number of difficult questions must be asked in this case. Why did law enforcement decide not to search KNIGHTEN’s property when they found Kayla’s car in December? Why was the case allowed to drag on for another three months, without any additional leads being followed? Kayla’s family and loved ones will have to live the rest of their lives wondering what might have been the results of a search of Knighten’s property in December. At the very least, it would have cut short three months of agony. As of today, Knighten has not been charged with murder. Kayla’s autopsy report has yet to be handed in to authorities, depending on the results of which, further charges may be pursued. The autopsy will also be able to determine if Kayla was alive when her car was found on December 3,2020

No one should go through the pain that Kayla’s family has had to endure over the past few months. Belinda needs and deserves answers regarding the investigation into Kayla’s and we need your help to ensure no other family has to go through this experience.

Kayla’s 21121 Law will be pushing for Amber Alerts for missing adults believed to be endangered and more vigorous pursuit by law enforcement for missing persons, as well as a system for handling missing person cases across different jurisdictions. One of the reasons why Kayla’s case dragged on so long was because the investigation was juggled between Detroit PD, Michigan State Police, and Livingston County Sheriff’s Department. This situation cannot continue.

The Amber Alert system has proven to be an invaluable tool in quickly resolving a number of child abductions since its adoption in 1996. In today’s world, similar alerts issued for adult missing persons could be just as useful. Kayla’s car was parked in the driveway of Knighten’s property. People driving by saw her car. If law enforcement had been alerted to the car’s presence earlier and if they had done due diligence, there might not have been any need for this petition. Please help us make sure that no other family has to go through the pain Kayla’s family.

Speak up - speak out - save lives!!!

Justice for Kayla 2-11-21

Thank you for your time! Updates will be made shortly!

3-16-21

 

We have tried over and over again to retain an attorney for Kayla’s case! No one will take it until the autopsy report comes in (road block - we will swerve some how some way)! 
We are in need of legal advise - if you or anyone you know can be of assistance please contact Belinda Pierce on Facebook

3-18-21

 

We so badly want to give out more information on this investigation, we are just scared of saying something wrong or something that is not a fact! We absolutely need legal advise and counsel- please reach out if you know of anyone in Wayne County, Mi or Livingston County, Mi.We were told today to look into civil rights lawyers! Please help guide us in our fight for Kayla! 
You can also email us at Justice4Kayla21121@gmail.com

Update 3-19-21

DOWAN KNIGHTEN was placed on unsupervised custody as of 03/19/21. The reason for this release is: Electronic Monitoring.

Please sign and share! 

Updated 3-19-21 at 4:26pm

Belinda’s Letter to Kayla 

PLEASE SHARE MY LETTER TO KAYLA!! Dearest Kayla Pierce I reported you missing after we hadn't seen or heard from you and it's definitely not like you! Thanksgiving came and went without a word from you. I had knots in my stomach and my heart full of worry so I reported you Missing on Nov 28th 2020 on Nov 28th a man named DOWAN KNIGHTEN got pulled over in your car I believe he got arrested but bonded out.. Wow what a record He has!!!�! He had your car the whole time you were Missing!!! On Dec 2nd Jessica was helping make phone calls and finally got in touch with the 8th they located your car!! But not you. The following day Dec 3rd Shelly and I took a ride down to the 8th sat out front for like 4 hours speaking to the people inside we had to stay outside because of covid they even asked if I had a set of your keys at first it seemed like they wanted us to go pick it up oh wait BAD area they had us wait while they were speaking to the people out here in Livingston They finally decided to go get your car they went to DOWAN KNIGHTENS front door and he handed them your keys oh so nicely they asked about you he said you let him borrow it.. I thought to myself and told Shelly that's a lie!! You just bought your car..But they still didn't look for you.. KNOWING YOUR A MISSING PERSON!! Kaylynn 3rd birthday came and went without you here Christmas came and went without you here The new year without you here. Your family and friends searching hanging up flyers trying to find the answer to where you might be January went by with no answers and believe me I asked and so did many others!! Then here came February Amanda my tech support sending emails making phone calls like every other week with no answers!!! I will never in my life time ever forget the loud knock on my front door at about 10:30 Feb11th with a policeman standing there asking if I'm Belinda Pierce and he needed to talk to me it was like having a knife stuck though my chest he told me they found you.Kayden was still up I'm so glad he didn't over here him telling me about you he told me I would be getting a call from livingston and I did.. They FOUND YOU WHERE YOUR CAR WAS 1ST LOCATED AT DOWAN KNIGHTENS IN HIS BACK YARD!!! I'm so very sorry it makes me sick how sorry my poor Baby girl had to wait be found as a Angle. ALL THEY HAD TO WAS LOOK WHEN THEY PICKED YOUR CAR UP!! LOOK FOR A MISSING PERSON KAYLA PIERCE AND THEY DIDN'T LOOK!! THEY DIDN'T EVEN LOOK!! We love and miss you!!! Forever in our. ❤� �

Updated 3/21/21

  • The Detroit News put out an article on Kayla’s Case by George Hunter - the story and pictures can be viewed in the updates to this petition 
  • Updated 4-9-2021

 

Updated 7/1/21 - New news article from WHMI
column48: Michigan State Senate, Michigan State House, Jewell Jones, Rodney Wakeman, Debbie Stabenow, Kevin Daley, Yousef Rabhi, Gary Peters, Fred Upton, Debbie Dingell, Rashida Tlaib, Dan Kildee, Brenda Law...
column49:
Kayla’s Law 21121 wants answers in what what happened and what doesn’t done right in this case? Law enforcement needs to be given more men in city’s that are under budgeted, and others just need to do their jobs. 

We want answers into her investigation! 
We want a law set in place to actively alert people in local surroundings of when they are first reported missing since it takes longer to report an adult than a child. Call it a red alert for missing people in danger! Whatever the cause of the delay in Kayla’s case we want answers, her mom, kids, family, loved ones, and friends! This cannot just be swept under the rug - many more families have gone through many of the same traumas with no answers! Instead of fighting let’s work together for a change! Let’s change lives like we weren’t able to do for Kayla!

column39: Ask the UK Home Office to end the inhumane treatment of the Kelton family by the UKVI
column46: Amber Rudd MP: If they have been granted their visa, why are the Keltons still forced to remain separated?
column47:
They hold a UK visa- so why is this British/American married couple still forced to remain on separate continents?

Article 8 of the European Convention of Human Rights (ECHR) says: “Everyone has the right to respect for his private and family life, his home and his correspondence.

There shall be no interference by a public authority with the exercise of this right except such as is in accordance with the law and is necessary in a democratic society in the interests of national security, public safety or the economic well-being of the country, for the prevention of disorder or crime, for the protection of health or morals, or for the protection of the rights and freedoms of others.”

Charles' rights to his family life, as a law-abiding British citisen, are again being tampered with-- and this is AFTER his wife was granter leave to enter the UK.

Charles and Leah Kelton applied for a UK settlement visa in November 2016, and were finally granted the visa in May 2017 after an arduous journey fraught with hold-ups by the UKVI. But when the visa vignette was affixed to Leah's passport with the wrong date stamped by the UKVI, they swiftly contacted the UKVI's telephone service to alert them to their mistake so that it might be rectified before the couple were obligated to be in the UK for the start of Charles' MSc course in mid-Sept.

However, despite having been granted her visa, Leah is still unable to enter the UK due to UKVI's lack of response. It has now been 12 weeks since reaching out to UKVI to rectify their mistake, and the couple are STILL waiting for any word on moving forward.

Meanwhile, Charles had to return to the UK without his wife in mid-Sept. On top of being prevented from living in marriage together, or for this devoted couple to even see one another, the situation further prevents Leah from adequately working her business, or indeed making any plans toward anything, as they have no indication of when UKVI will finish their case so she can be reunited with her husband. Due to making arrangements for their move when they started the visa journey last year, she is effectively left homeless as well as husband-less, relying on the good graces of family and friends as they wait indefinitely for UKVI to rectify her vignette so that they might finally be reunited and carry on with their lives. They have lived in this especially suspended state for nearly 3 months now, with a further 9 months of suspense awaiting the visa process prior to this.

The couple are put in extreme distress as the hold up to their entire lives stretches on and they are parted without end, to the point of resulting health issues from the anxiety, effects on Charles' important coursework, and the resulting financial trauma of having to stand up under separate expenses on separate continents while gainful employment must be put on hold. And they still have been given no timeline for when the UKVI might fix their mistake and finish this nearly year-long visa journey. The UKVI's practices are causing severe mental torture, and emotional and financial trauma for this couple. All the more as they continue to make no assurances that they even know they have put this family in such a position by their negligence. The smallest bit of personal contact would go a LONG way for people embroiled in such uncertainty brought on by UKVI's tardy practices.

And this is not the first time in this process that a UKVI mistake has cost the Kelton family dearly. 

After spending the first 3 years of their marriage living in the US. Charles and Leah Kelton decided to move to the UK to be closer to Charles' chronically unwell and aging mother when he was accepted onto an MSc degree course in Oxford. The couple carefully saved up to meet the financial requirements for Leah's visa while Charles is studying, and submitted their application while obligated to be parted from each other by an ocean for what was supposed to take 12 weeks only. They have now been forced to spend about 5 of the last 12 months apart- and still counting.

UK Visas & Immigration refused Leah's application in February 2017, despite the couple meeting all of the outlined requirements. At this time, Charles was deep into the first year of his master's course in the UK, and Leah had their life in the US packed up and was poised ready to join her husband for their new life. UKVI not only did not thoroughly investigate their application before making the refusal, but they sent the official decision letter to the Keltons in ACTUAL tatters. Ripped in two, crumpled and blackened so that the reasons for the negative decision couldn't even be read. The envelope it arrived in containing all of the other documents, however, was perfectly intact. So someone chose to put the decision letter into the return envelope in that condition. The Keltons were scandalized that this service they had paid so much to receive was rendered to them in this way, and still with no explanation or apology for the additional distress caused them.

UKVI provides no way to communicate with its caseworkers to work out such mistakes, so the Keltons' only recourse was to appeal this original decision- a process which it is rumored can take upwards of nine months. They knew they met all of the requirements outlined by UKVI for this visa, and their fee could not be returned to them even when UKVI were clearly mistaken. So, they were forced to be separated longer, with no sense for what was going to happen, or when they might know, and no one to speak to about the appalling service they had received. 

Thankfully, upon re-evaluation, and some advocacy from Charles' local MP in Buckinghamshire, the Rt Hon John Bercow, the UKVI overturned their original decision and granted Leah her visa in May 2017. By this time, Charles finished his first year of his studies and returned to the states to be with his wife where they waited out the processing with members of her family and friends, and found short-term work for the summer, including Leah continuing to conduct her business with a definite timeline to book work in.

The Keltons sent Leah's passport to the UK for the visa vignette to be affixed to it, and explained to the caseworker emailing them that they had to return to the UK between the end of Aug-middle of Sept, due to having found work in the US for the summer, but needing to be back for Charles' course to start up again mid-Sept. After a long 10 week wait for UKVI to place the visa vignette in Leah's passport, a passport UKVI misplaced for nearly a month, they finally stamped it on 17 July 2017. They then sat on her passport for 11 days, finally putting it in the post to her on 28 July 2017. The post then took 10 days to arrive to the Keltons, putting it in their hands 7 Aug 2017. At this point they discovered that the vignette expiration would be 16 Aug 2017- two weeks before the time they could leave their summer work commitments and only 7 days from the day they finally received it back. UKVI made no warning to them that they would only have a week, instead of the 30 days promised, to tie up every loose end in their US lives and make their international move. And they had many work commitments in those last two weeks of August. 

So, on the very day they received the passport back with the unusable vignette due to UKVI's tardiness and lack of communication, they contacted UKVI's answering service, incurring MORE personal fees because there is no way to talk with anyone to whom you have paid a large fee to render this visa service without paying for the privilege, and they applied for a vignette transfer, incurring another few hundred dollars despite the mistake being the UKVI's. However, when they heard back from the answer services, they were told to cancel the vignette transfer and that their case would be escalated to the home office. 12 weeks later (as of 30 Oct 2017), nothing has yet been done. UKVI makes no contact and communicates NO timelines for the couple to be able to make plans by. This husband and wife, who were granted their visa 5 months ago, still have no idea when they will see one another again, let alone be able to start their life together once more. There is no one held accountable for the mistakes made, no compensation for the damage done.

This is inhumane treatment and the UKVI's inefficient work practices are causing untold distress to many more families than just the Keltons as they try to hold their lives together in the uncertainty. While we understand that UKVI must have a very heavy workload, we the people feel it it is unacceptable to conduct this service in such a way that causes families so much grief.

We believe the Keltons are experiencing a breach of their human rights by being kept apart by the Home Office's negligence, and we petition the UK home office to rectify this mistake on Leah Kelton's vignette stamp as a matter of priority. We ask Home Secretary Amber Rudd to see to it that UKVI prioritizes fixing their mistake to finish their visa process by the end of October, so that this couple can finally be reunited and try to rebuild their lives.

We also petition the home office to implement better practices for communication between the UKVI and their clients in future cases to spare anyone else from facing this mental torture, health-threatening anxiety, damage to marriages, trauma to families, and ridiculous financial burden to honest, hard-working, everyday people just trying to take care of their families...

How ridiculous for a family to have come through such a trial, only to finally be granted the visa, but due to an unresponsive UKVI, unable to use it!

Thank you so much for your attention this matter.
column48: Amber Rudd MP, Theresa May MP
column49: We ask Home Secretary Amber Rudd to call the UK Home Office to end the inhumane treatment of the Kelton family who are being kept apart even after having been granted a visa. UKVI made a mistake when they dated the visa vignette and are now unresponsive when asked to fixed it. Leah was granted the visa in May, and they have been waiting for UKVI to fix the vignette since the beginning of August. We require urgent attention to this matter. Families should not be kept apart.

column39: Justice For Johnny
column46: Warner Bros. Pictures: Justice For Depp
column47:
Johnny Depp is an amazing actor and a wonderful man. He has brought so much joy in the many movies he has done and all the public appearances he has taken a part in. Since May of 2016, Johnny Depp has been accused of physical abuse by his then-wife Amber Heard. She divorced him and ruined his public image. It was later shown that Amber was actually abusing him. 

I would like to petition Warner Brothers to reinstate Johnny Depp as Grindlewald (should he want it) and I would like to petition Disney to fire Amber Heard from all future films including the Aquaman franchise. 

I believe it to be unfair that Johnny Depp is getting railroaded just because he is a man. I have no doubt that if he were a woman, none of this would be happening to him.

Amber took advantage of her gender and the fact that so many brave women were coming out and facing their abusers to tare down Johnny Depp's reputation and ruin his future chances of being in a film.

Linked below are a few news articles about how he has been treated in the court of public opinion and in actual court because of all the things he was wrongfully accused of.

 

A complete timeline:

column33: Allow Military Service Members to wear military sash at Graduation Ceremony
column35: [' be <mark>heard</mark>, and make certain Service Members are respected and honored in the future.']
column39: Allow Military Service Members to wear military sash at Graduation Ceremony
column46: Havana School District 126: Allow Military Service Members to wear military sash at Graduation Ceremony
column47: The current school board policy disallows students, who have committed to and are actively serving their country and community in the military, from wearing their awarded military sash at Graduation Ceremony. The school has added insult to injury by likening this military honor to “free advertising” for the Armed Forces. Let’s stand together and ensure our Service Members are not stripped of this honor at future graduation ceremonies. By signing this petition, we can let the community’s voice be heard, and make certain Service Members are respected and honored in the future.

Ms. Portwood is <mark>heard</mark> threatening to stab']
column39: Boycott MTV *STAND AGAINST* domestic violence-fire cast who commit physical assault
column46: Viacom: Boycott MTV *STAND AGAINST* domestic violence-fire cast who commit physical assault
column47:
The “Teen Mom” spin-off of “16 and pregnant” first aired in December, 2009. Viacom and MTV have filmed and aired various illegal offenses committed by cast members; Amber Portwood, Ryan Edwards, Kailyn Lowry, Leah Messer, Janelle Evans. From driving under the influence (DUI), drug abuse, texting and driving, driving while using a handheld device and verbal and physical abuse ie. domestic violence.

MTV has continued to employ these parents while encouraging bad behavior to boost their ratings.

In July of 2019 Amber Portwood was arrested and charged with domestic battery; allegedly wielding a machete during the altercation. Since this arrest audio recordings were released to the public by her victim, Andrew Glennon; the father of her youngest child. Ms. Portwood is heard threatening to stab Andrew with her son present.

Immediately after Ms. Portwood’s arrest MTV filmed cast members supporting her actions by accompanying her to court. Horrible message of support!

This is not Ms. Portwood’s first arrest for domestic battery; she was convicted of domestic violence in 2010 and received a 5 year sentence. After being released from prison Ms. Portwood was allowed to continue her employment with Viacom-MTV.

Viacom-MTV continues to stand in support of domestic violence by setting no guidelines for the cast in regards to illegal behavior. 

In 2013, Kailyn Lowry was filmed verbally and physically abusing Javi Marroquin in an altercation with her son present. Ms. Lowry has continued to commit illegal offenses that have been filmed and aired.

We encourage everyone to boycott Viacom-MTV until the cast that have committed illegal offenses are ALL terminated immediately.

We need to send MTV a strong message that domestic violence is wrong! Stop watching MTV. Boycott MTV!

Domestic violence effects men, women and children; twelve million each year, 25 people a minute according to the National Domestic Violence Hotline.

If you or someone you know is a victim of domestic violence please contact the National Domestic Violence Hotline at 1-800-799-7233.

column33: Releasing state inmates under protection of the corona virus spread
column35: [' yet to be <mark>heard</mark> of or thought of. Some inmates served majority of their entire time, with less than']
column39: Releasing state inmates under protection of the corona virus spread
column46: Andrew M. Cuomo: Releasing state inmates under protection of the corona virus spread
column47: Only county and federal inmates are being released under corona virus pandemics. State inmates have yet to be heard of or thought of. Some inmates served majority of their entire time, with less than 180 days less to go. Many have underlying medical conditions. Staff is not provided with proper PPE equipment. Non violent offenders should be home who have such little time left. There is no social distancing in prisons. They share the same phone, bathrooms, showers etc. There is not proper cleaning materials.  The corona virus is spreading like wild fire through the prison system.  Let's get these people the help they need. Why are they not getting released on compassionate release as well?!

column33: FREE KYLE CHAPMAN !!!!!
column35: [' us and sign this petition and let us have our voices <mark>heard</mark> say to the city of Berkeley we know about']
column39: FREE KYLE CHAPMAN !!!!!
column46: Alameda County District Attorney: FREE KYLE CHAPMAN !!!!!
column47:
Sadly in America people who do not agree with Marxist Ideology is being persecuted in some cities in America. Berkeley California has an epidemic of violent Marxist Terrorists Called Antifa, BAMN ,and Black Bloc inciting and visiting violence on the people of America. These are terrorist organizations that inflict violence on people they feel do not fit into their Fascist violent Marxist ideology.

 In Berkeley California you can and will be attacked if you are pro American. It has happened and continues to happen to people in this city all the time. If you are seen wearing or carrying an American flag, it is likely you will be attacked in violent fashion. If your a conservative and it is discovered you are , you will likely be attacked. The Mayor of this city incites violence on the people by making outlandish claims that speaking against Marxism is HATE SPEECH. This city harbors Marxist violent terrorists and does nothing about it and this needs to be stopped.

 Kyle Chapman is being made an example of by these Marxists in Berkeley. They trumped up charges on him "pun intended" to quietly put him in jail for acting as a hero on March 4th in MLK park in Berkeley California. Myself and many others were horrified to see we were victims of violence that day and men like Kyle Chapman and others defended us and he put his life on line protecting us and I am grateful he did. The police did nothing and were ordered to do nothing. They stood back while the elderly, women, and even a elderly disabled vet was attacked that day and did nothing at all. All one has to do is look at the March 4th videos on Berkeley California and you will see the truth of what I am claiming

 In these videos you will see Terrorists in Black Masks burning the American flag, Burning free speech signs, and waving communist flags chanting hatred for America. You will also see elderly people being beaten and pepper sprayed. You will see women and many others being beaten by violent Antifa thugs and nothing at all is being done to stop this by the police.

 Kyle Chapman is being made an example of by the communist terrorist harboring city of Berkeley. We the people need to stand by Kyle and say enough. We need to sign this petition and show we do not approve of this and we are asking that the proper people be jailed and that is Antifa and not a hero like Kyle Chapman. Kyle saved my life and I believe he saved many others that day as well.


Kyle was a hero that day, not a criminal. Please stand with us and sign this petition and let us have our voices heard say to the city of Berkeley we know about terrorists like Antifa and BAMN. We the American people do not approve of them trying to jail a hero on a trumped up charge while allowing Terrorists like Antifa and Bamn to roam the streets attacking American citizens with explosives, knives, and clubs.

They are claiming Kyle had a lead based stick.Well Antifa brings knives, clubs, and explosives and nothing is done to them, how many arrests did you see happen to them on March 4th , April 15th and the latest August 27th terrorists attacks on the American people?

Ill answer that , next to none. This is nothing more then a witch hunt on Kyle Chapman If they can do this to him, they can do this to any of us. "ets please stand by for him and say enough. American people have a right to be safe and protected. If the police refuse to do the job, then who will protect them? Thank God for brave men like Kyle Chapman. I might be dead if It was not for men like him. Thank you so much. God Bless America

You be the judge, this happened at my event. Look at the animals in Berkeley and they want to put away a hero like Kyle Chapman.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bgxWxwinHrc
column49:
FREE KYLE CHAPMAN !!!!!

  Please consider dropping charges. We the people ask you consider the circumstances and the actions that had to be taken that day to save lives. This man saved many lives of people who could not defend themselves. We are asking you please to reconsider these charges. This was a very scary day for many of us and Mr. Chapman put his life on the line for us and I believe many of us may have been hurt badly or died had men like him not been there.

  Antifa and BAMN had knives , clubs , pepper spray, and they were using it on the people. The elderly , vets , and women. It was horrible what they did and I am thankful Kyle saved my life and others. Please reconsider these charges. We are asking please reconsider , the circumstances were insane out there. We depended on the police and they did not protect us and thank God for men like Kyle Chapman. They saved our lives and I am grateful. I hope you will consider the circumstances and drop the charges. Thank you so much

column33: Legalize Axolotls in New Brunswick Canada
column35: [" a fit and getting them taken away. They've been here this long and we havnt seen or <mark>heard</mark> of any"]
column39: Legalize Axolotls in New Brunswick Canada
column46: New Brunswick Provincial Government: Legalize Axolotls in New Brunswick Canada
column47: Multiple people have owned Axolotls in this Province for a long time now. Now CBC news is calling them out for not enforcing it, but where are all of these axolotls to go if attained why is it only now that it is a problem. Their original home is destroyed and now they thrive in households. These animals are fish and arnt just going to escape your home. If someone releases any domestic animal into the wild that is a crime. So why normalize putting "pets" in the wild. They arnt harming anyone in our homes. I'm making this petition so we can keep our babies without worrying of someone throwing a fit and getting them taken away. They've been here this long and we havnt seen or heard of any extreme impacts. Just legalize them instead of wasting money policing something you've never really made clear to the public.  People are aloud to do science experiments on them and have them in little tubs, but then people who give a animal that's endangered that cannot thrive in its original environment a good life is a crime. Please help people keep their babies and help to stop the normalization of releasing pets into the wild. If they continue to be illegal im worried people may illegally dump them somewhere and cause more issues if they arnt legalized, just out of fear of being charged.

column35: [' <mark>heard</mark>. \xa0Help us keep our homes, belongings and loved ones safe!\xa0\n\xa0']
column39: Evacuate Homeless Camp near 116th & Meridian
column46: City of Puyallup: Evacuate Homeless Camp near 116th & Meridian
column47:
A large, 20+ tent homeless camp has taken over the vacant land owned by “Artz Living Trust” located where 116th St E meets 43rd Ave SW in Puyallup, WA.  The homeless camp has grown RAPIDLY and has come with INCREASINGLY negative effects on the surrounding neighborhoods.   

There have been multiple reports of personal items being stolen- including children’s bicycles, lawn furniture, use of outdoor hoses to fill gallons and gallons of water from a private residence.  An enormous amount of littering, noise, and traffic from  “interesting” people in the quaint, quite neighborhood it once was before the camp appeared.  

Surrounding businesses have also reported multiple accountants of robbery.  There is an obvious amount of drug use and criminal activity taking place among the camp.    “Artz living trust” has been notified of the encampment and has reportedly neglected to take the appropriate action to enforce the evacuation of the camp.  

Our neighborhood is being drastically impacted by the negative behavior they have brought with them.  Our children’s bus stop is located just beside the camps enterance, creating very unnerved parents!  

To name a few, the Puyallup police dept, city and health department have been notified of this- and NO ONE SEEMS TO CARE!     It’s easy to ignore when it isn’t effecting your daily life and YOUR FAMILY! 

Please sign this petition in support of eviciting this camp! The neighbors will be speaking at the next city council meeting in hopes to be heard.  Help us keep our homes, belongings and loved ones safe!

column46:

districts install them.
column47:
Enough is enough!  Public Schools are over due for audio / cameras in all classrooms and areas where there is contact with students. School buses have them? Public places have them? why not Public Schools? 

You can read Owen Murphy's story below. He and all students are asking for your support to make this change now.

A Letter to the West Virginia Department of Education

My name is Owen.

I am 7 years old and a first grader at Berkeley Heights Elementary School in Martinsburg,West Virginia.

Well, I was, but now I’m at a new school.

I was diagnosed with mitochondrial disease as a baby and I also have non-verbal autism. I’ve been in the same classroom with kids with like me for two years.

I had three teachers: Christina Lester, June Yurish and Kristin Douty. My mom liked that they were always hugging and loving on me.

It was a big fat lie.

Last year, my mom took me to the neurologist to see why I was hitting and spitting on her, but she said it may just be my normal.

I was trying to tell her about how my teachers hit me, but I couldn’t.

Since I started my new school, I hug and kiss my mom every day. I was worried she may hurt me like my teachers. Miss Douty got a teaching award last year and I have never understood why.

My friend Adri’s mom recorded our teachers being mean to us and told the principal, Amber Boeckman. She listened to the recording and told Adri’s mom that the teachers weren’t talking about her.

What about me?

Adri stopped coming to school. I went, no one told my mom about my being strapped to my potty chair or my teachers threatening to hit me.

After the school heard the mean, my mom had an IEP meeting. My coordinator, Karen Petrucci, told my mom, “This is the safest classroom for Owen to be.” Why did she not tell my mom the truth?

The Superintendent of Berkeley County Schools, Manny Arvon, said, “I learned of the incident in early October and was greatly concerned.” Why didn’t he tell my mom or help me get away? He let three evil people pretend to take care of me for another month.

My teachers would tell my mom that I was so protective of the other kids. I tried to shield them from the hate, but I’m only seven.

No one has been fired. 
My teachers resigned and I worry where they’ll go.
My principal and superintendent must hate kids, at least, ones with special needs.

Love, 

 

I hear to many stories and have experienced myself what is happening to our schools. This problem is long over due and needs everyones support like yesterday. This change will encourage me to continue my mission for other parents and their children that I was not able to do for my son. allow all students to feel safe while learning.  Allow our families to feel security and piece of mind knowing the inside is just as secure as the outside. Our community can make a difference. We as a community have the responsibility to do what is right, stand up for our children that have no voice.
column49:
Todd C. Gilbert,
My name is Tina Anderson. I am just your regular country girl from Winchester Va. born and lived all my life. 
I am reaching out to ask that you and others that can change what is dysfunctional in these schools. I'm asking you to hear the voices of all the children across the United States. I'm praying that others will stand in each of their states as Amber Pack and Kasey Murphy of Berkeley County, West Virginia.

This is not a new case. It's just one of many. those responsible to allow this escalate and continue over years in all school districts. the children with voices go home every day after school in fear. Teachers fear losing their jobs if they step up and express what is happening. Parents have trust in the school Principal, staff, and Teachers being a part of their child's life emotional, physically, and mentally because that is what each school districts hand booklet states.

Mr. Gilbert, each of these groups have stepped up and brought this to the attention of whom was to by law take responsibility and didn't. why has this been allowed to escalate. I ask as a parent along with other parents. Why?

I will continue to fight for children, parents, and those that work passionately with children.

There are many changes needed and added into law. these are just a couple that I what to discuss.
1. Those who are employed and in contact with children must be go through Child Development Courses and Seminars that will keep them up on changes of Adhd and other learning disabilities to be able to teach and work with children.
2. Audio / Video in every area of each school that adults have contact with children.

I will be waiting to hear from you to speak about other concerns and what is happening in our schools.

Sincerely,
Tina Anderson

column46: What's in Your Backyard???
column47:
Please vote No on the Proposed Amendment to Land Development Code Section 12-2-10(C)(4)(B) Historic and Preservation Land Use District; Old East Hill Preservation Zoning District: Uses Permitted; OEHC-1 neighborhood Commercial District.

Dear Pensacola City Council Members,

East Hill Animal Hospital/Pensacola Pet Resort Too is requesting a City Code change that would allow outdoor exercise areas in the city’s C-1 zoning.  While outdoor exercise areas are allowed in C-3 (light industrial) areas of Pensacola, no such zoning is permitted in our historic districts. 

Currently, this Old East Hill business is operating under a Conditional Use Permit granted in 2008 in which the owner agreed to not have outdoor exercise areas.  

The code was amended to allow this business to operate within our historic district with strict limitations in order to prevent future complications.  At the time neighbors expressed their concern that outdoor areas would create a noise nuisance-this worry has become a reality.

The goal is not to have this business move or shut down; we just want it to comply with the original agreement. 

The owner of the facility is proposing this code change because the business was found in violation of the original agreement.  Instead of proposing a code change that would affect the entire city, the business needs to comply with the original agreement. 

 After hearing from over 50 residents who live and own property in our neighborhood, Old East Hill Property Owners Association Board voted unanimously in opposition of the code change.

 We are very concerned that our voice was not heard in 2008 during the initial permit granting and was not heard at the recent Planning and Zoning meeting; however we are also very hopeful City Council will listen to its constituents at this time.   

Even though we are pet friendly and supportive of our small businesses, we cannot support this code change, which would allow inappropriate business operation in our preservation district.

Thank you for your careful consideration of our concern.

Sincerely,

Amber Hoverson

OEHPOA President

column46: The City of Lancaster : Address the racing issue on J-8 in Lancaster CA
column47:
The past few years j-8 in between Challenger Way and 20th St. East has become known to the community for racing. We have lost multiple lives as a result to the community not being heard. We do not want another family to go through the pain of losing a loved one. Help us by signing this petition to put a light on 15th St. and J-8, and potentially reduce the speed on this street. 
Thank  you

column39: We bring back Johnny Depp as Grindelwald
column46: Warner Brothers: We bring back Johnny Depp as Grindelwald
column47:
●Sign to counter this injustice! let's bring Johnny Depp back as Grindelwald!

Johnny Depp has announced that he has resigned from his role as Gellert Grindelwald in the Fantastic Beasts franchise.

In a statement on Instagram, Depp said: "Firstly, I'd like to thank everybody who has gifted me with their support and loyalty. I have been humbled and moved by your many messages of love and concern, particularly over the last few days. I wish to let you know that I have been asked to resign by Warner Bros from my role as Grindelwald in Fantastic Beasts and I have respected and agreed to that request."

The news comes after Depp lost his legal battle against The Sun after the newspaper had previously published an article referring to Depp as a "wife beater" and claimed he had assaulted his ex-wife Amber Heard.
column49: We bring back Johnny Depp as Grindelwald

column39: Fire Aquaman 2 Producer Peter Safran
column46: Warner Bros : Fire Aquaman 2 Producer Peter Safran
column47:
"Fire Amber Heard, or fire those who should be firing her, for not firing her!

Warner Bros is ignoring its fan base (and social justice, propriety, and reality) yet again whilst they seem quite happy with themselves about it! Producer Peter Safran said this week, 


  •  “I don’t think we’re ever going to react to, honestly, pure fan pressure. You gotta do what’s best for the movie. We felt that if it’s (director) James Wan, and (lead male actor) Jason Momoa, it should be (female lead actor) Amber Heard. That’s really what it was.”
    The change.org Petition to remove Heard from her role has reportedly drawn “1.8 Million signatures and counting.”

Despite huge pressure from fans and Hollywood alike, including a litany of legal problems in three or more countries across the world, Amber Heard REFUSES to budge to the pressure and do what's right. Only someone without any shame could have so much evidence against them floating online in all circles, yet choose to retain their position in the film. Only a producer with no shame would keep her.

She is not alone. Not only is she being protected from justice by very powerful organizations-- she's dragging others into her legal battles and implicating them in her fantastical tales of brutality and abuse. She's even subpoena'd the LAPD and accused the officers who specialize in Domestic Violence, of not doing their job right! Her biggest enabler so far are her lying entourage, Judge Nicols (friend) and Peter Safran (boss). Not to mention Elon Musk, the ALCU, and the poor Childrens hospital whom are still waiting for her pledged donations.

As for the man allowing this to happen (Peter Safron), he should not be gloating but rather filing his resignation! Instead of firing both actors, WB chose to boot the victim and the abuser remains. This is social injustice at quite a visible level and its surprising at how proud this producer seems to be with himself and his demonstrably despicable decisions.

As for Amber Heard, she started it ALL. She should be paying the price for this litany of bad repute.

Her divorce was messy but that's why there was an NDA signed, so both parties could move on amicably. Amber Heard ignored it and threw abuse claims at her former husband Johnny Depp like they were skittles, thus instigating said legal battles.

All it took was her word on a scandalous British tabloid for Peter Safran and other Warner Bros big wigs to not only ask for Johnny Depp's resignation in an already being filmed "Fantastical Beasts" sequel--but Disney took him off their roster of Pirates of the Caribbean franchise as well. All over a well timed "hit piece" coinciding with Amber Heard being named the ALCU "Ambassador". Johnny Depp lost his roles and has an ongoing court case to battle in order to clear his name and undo what she has done to him, her supposed ex paramour. The love of her life. The man she's tried to frame since they got married and long before..

Demonstrably as well, this is not the first relationship that she has been abusive in; her prior arrest record speaks volumes when it comes to her history in hurting people she loves, like her ex girlfriend. Not to mention what she does to her own sister and employees behind closed doors.

Needless to say, fans are not happy AT ALL with this woman representing a Justice League Character. Its absolutely abhorrent to a LOT of people.

The political climate of "cancelling" people without proper evidence needs to change. Company puppeteers need held accountable to do their jobs, not pansder to their own politics and preferences. If your customer says change it, you should at least CONSIDER changing it.

Not even her co-stars can stand her; this indicates that at the risk of losing the REAL cast of actors for the movie (like Nichole Kidman and Jason Mamoa), Producer Peter Safran is ignoring everyone and everything in order to keep Heard on set. Why???

Why does she even have a job at this point? Amber Heard's legal troubles are serious criminal offenses; she isn't welcome in Australia without subpoena regarding Perjury she committed regarding her dogs-and she's under investigation by the FBI in the US for filing false documents (allegedly) regarding her workers. 

Wheres the proof?

Witnesses, photographs, video, audio recordings, and  testimony in court PROVE that Amber Heard did NOT have bruises or a broken nose/black eyes as she contends.. um, EVER? Much less in the days after she was supposedly accosted by Depp so violently her nose was supposedly broken. And yet she paraded down to the courthouse with a misplaced "bruise look scuff" on her cheek (nothing else) to file a restraining order against a man who admittedly would no sooner run away from her than anything else.

Photos she took of supposed bruising seemed to disappear and reappear in different spots of her face from shot to shot. Somehow overnight after supposedly getting black eyes and a broken nose in fact, she showed up on a night time comedy show--scott free of ANY injuries! Her makeup artist testified as much.

That's right folks, for the massive and heavy handed amount of physical abuse this woman claims to have been recipient of, including being thrown through a glass door and dragged by her hair through the glass and choked up onto the counter by her short husband and hit repeatedly in life changing ways.. There are ZERO medical records backing up any claims of her injuries, past or present. No one to corroborate and actually plenty who have seen the reverse!

She just doesn't have PROOF in ANY form of Johnny Depp being abusive towards her. Meanwhile 80 plus witnesses on Depps side are testifying that she NEVER got hurt by Depp, despite her attacking him like an animal! Need we mention the incident where she cut his finger off by throwing a bottle at him? High impact wound, that.

Like a child playing games, Amber Heard just decided to tell a fantastical story to save face when they asked for a prenup, and expected the world to believe her! Well, we don't. 

We are not buying Heard's lies. I certainly won't be buying into Aquaman 2 or any WB movie, show, streaming service etc. especially after Peter Safran divulged that he doesn't give a frig about his customers and fan base. Warner Bros and Disney are not "must haves" in my arsenal of entertainment. Certainly with unscrupulous people running the media giants.

As for Amber, her web of lies are coming down one after the other. Its taking time unfortunately, because as an abuser, she has surrounded herself with barriers of protection including being the "spokesperson" for many social justice causes including the ACLU! It is going to be really difficult to extract this deeply embedded blood sucking tick. But there is hope.

Humanity wise, Heard is finally showing her true colors. The divorce settlement that she promised 7 million dollars to charities (including ACLU and a Children's hospital) has been ordered by courts to show what we all knew all along. Amber Lies. These charities have seen very little of her investment whilst she has profited in full both inside and outside of court by claiming that she gave all her divorce settlement away to charity when she most definitely DID NOT.

She bolsters her court cases by claiming she is such a philanthropist and yet she has retained her settlement money and continues to claim that she's been self sufficient during her relationship with Johnny Depp.

Unless you count free rent to 3 penthouses in Hollywood Eastern Tower (a whole floor) as "self sufficient" all while accepting free Teslas from your side man--then theres yet another drop in the lie bucket for Amber Heard.

Justice Nichols is now under scrutiny for his verdict in the Sun's favor because his wife has ties to Amber Heard and Nichols has ties to The Sun (the actual defendant of Johnny Depp's British lawsuit). Not to mention his judgement was ludicrous! It's being bashed by academia left and right as we speak for good reason.

In American court however, Now those lies are being exposed inside court. I don't believe miss Heard will be able to dismiss this one so easily.

The goal of this petition is to knock big wig Producer Peter Safran from his comfortable perch and see how he likes being in the spotlight? His indignity and apatheticness towards domestic abuse survivors is shameful. Will he do the right thing if its HIS name on the line? We will find out soon!

Needless to say, fans of the Justice League will not tolerate such injustices! Either fire Amber Heard, or fire those who should be firing her for not firing her! 

Listen to reason--or expect the next petition to be "Boycott AT&T, TimeWarner, and WarnerBros!"

column33: Stop Hunting Wolves
