Throughout all of this, <mark>Heard</mark> has not lost her job as a']
column39: Justice for Johnny Depp
column46: Warner Brothers: Justice for Johnny Depp
column47:
Amber Heard accused Johnny Depp of domestic violence, causing a chain of events that has ultimately led to Johnny Depp being terminated by both Disney and Warner Brothers.

Depp filed a civil lawsuit against Heard for defamation, claiming Heard lied about the abuse and claimed that he was a victim of abuse, not the other way around. Despite vast evidence (recordings, pictures, character witnesses, etc.) proving Depp's innocence and incriminating Heard, Depp lost his civil case against Heard.

Prior to the Civil lawsuit, around the time the tape recordings came out, it was announced that Disney had decided to no longer move forward with Depp for the Pirates of the Caribbean series. Then, Depp lost his civil case against Heard so Warner Brothers essentially forced Depp to resign (it was a resign or we will fire you type of deal). Throughout all of this, Heard has not lost her job as a sponsor for Loreal or her role in Aquaman 2. These actions by Disney and Warner Brothers glorify the abuser and blame the victim.

Domestic violence is already not taken as seriously as it should be in America, causing many men and women to be killed by their abusers or, like in this case, have their name tarnished and their livelihood stripped from them. I am asking that Disney and Warner Brothers become a part of the solution, instead of remaining a part of the problem. Please re-instate Depp to his roles and show the world that you will not allow an abuser to destroy this man's livelihood.
column48: Warner Brothers, The Walt Disney Company, Walt Disney

column33: Reverse the Government's decision not to hold an inquiry into Orgreave
column35: ['<mark>Amber</mark> Rudd dismissed the calls for an inquiry into allegations of physical abuse, and the use of', ' be done.\nWe need to ensure that the voice of ordinary people is allowed to be <mark>heard</mark> and not silenced by a self interested elite.']
column39: Reverse the Government's decision not to hold an inquiry into Orgreave
column46: Amber Rudd MP: Change the government's decision not to hold an inquiry in Orgreave
column47:
Amber Rudd dismissed the calls for an inquiry into allegations of physical abuse, and the use of unnecessary force by police at the time of the conflict with miners that has become known as 'The Battle of Orgreave'. The Home Secretary's refusal to engage with allegations of political and police malpractice is clearly prejudicial to the process of democratic accountability in this country. We call on the government to reverse their decision, so that justice can not only be done, but be seen to be done.

We need to ensure that the voice of ordinary people is allowed to be heard and not silenced by a self interested elite.
column48: Amber Rudd MP, The Speaker of the House of Commons
column49: Change the government's decision not to hold an inquiry in Orgreave

column39: Domestic abuse affects millions of men. Double standards need to end. JusticeForJohnnyDepp
column46: Warner Brothers: Domestic abuse affects millions of men. Double standards need to end. JusticeForJohnnyDepp
column47:
Domestic abuse affects millions of men world wide every year. WB DC HBO have perpetuated the silencing of men who suffer from domestic violence by supporting a reasonably proven domestic abuser. Amber Heard admitted in court documents that she abused Johnny Depp by psychological violence, recordings of her admitting to hitting, throwing objects, verbally harassing and gaslighting Johnny have been heard around the world. The time has come for the world to take a stand for equal domestic violence awareness. 

According to the CDC in the United States, "Intimate Partner Violence [affects] About 1 in 3 men experienced contact sexual violence, physical violence, and/or stalking by an intimate partner during their lifetime.
Nearly 56% of men who were victims of contact sexual violence, physical violence, and/or stalking by an intimate partner first experienced these or other forms of violence by that partner before age 25." https://www.cdc.gov/violenceprevention/intimatepartnerviolence/men-ipvsvandstalking.html

And in the UK "The Office for National Statistics figures show every year that one in the three victims of domestic abuse are male equating to 757,000 men.." https://www.mankind.org.uk/statistics/statistics-on-male-victims-of-domestic-abuse/

End the double standard! There is still a largely held denial that men can be victims of domestic abuse and WB DC HBO are continuing this dismissive view. If equal awareness for domestic abuse victims has to have a high profile case to garner public acceptance then let it start with Amber and Johnny. Documentation, comfirmed recordings and statements have been made public of Amber violently attacking Johnny, throwing multiple objects and glass bottles at him resulting in the required surgery to repair bone and nerve damage. Some will argue "it was only a finger tip" but those are the people that don't understand the mental trauma that results from violence like this. 

WB DC HBO, producer Peter Safran has made a statement that he does not care what the fans want and has tried silencing our voices. If our voices are unwanted than so too is our money. 

This is a public call to boycott WB DC HBO productions and services. Pledge to cancel all subscriptions and boycott productions. Fan voices matter. Male domestic violence victims matter.

column33: The students of RVHS need Ms. Nelson
column35: [" and fun person to be around. I've <mark>heard</mark> and experienced nothing but good things about her. She does", " her job correctly and professionally. Let's keep <mark>Amber</mark> Nelson our English teacher! Please help for"]
column39: The students of RVHS need Ms. Nelson
column46: Round Valley High School: The students of RVHS need Ms. Nelson
column47:
Round Valley high school is dropping one of our best teachers for an unjust reason. She stands up for her students, and has some of the highest test scores Round Valley's seen. Our teacher is over qualified for her job and takes passion in the students and what she' doing! She leaves a very positive impact in our community and the future of Round Valley's students.

This teacher is a very outgoing and fun person to be around. I've heard and experienced nothing but good things about her. She does her job correctly and professionally. Let's keep Amber Nelson our English teacher! Please help for the future of Round valley students, they depend on it. Thank you for taking your time out of you day to support our cause, community, and the betterment of Round Valley's future academics.

column33: Help our school stay in our community!
column34: ['Our petition letter speaks for itself, but as a community we have a voice and we wish to be <mark>heard</mark>']
column35: [' seamless transition for everyone we can. We have seen and <mark>heard</mark> about students and faculty in both']
column39: Help our school stay in our community!
column46: Canyons School District : Help our school stay in our community!
column47:
As members of Edgemont’s PTA, concerned parents, voters and community members are excited for the new changes and building coming to the Edgemont campus (1085 E Galena Dr, Sandy, UT 84094) in 2020. As Edgemont is winding down and preparing to close its doors, we see our rich history of a neighborhood school which principals and administrators have fostered a community of collaboration, inclusion, and good will between teachers, faculty, students, PTA, families and the community. We would like to continue to grow this history as we make new history with Bell View students, faculty, staff and administrators, by requesting that the council votes for Option 2 allowing our Edgemont and Bell View students to stay in our neighborhood at Bell View campus (9800 S 800 E, Sandy, UT 84094), merging both schools into a new unified White City school, with a new name, new principal as well as a mascot and colors, during this transitional year of construction on the new building. We have 6 main reasons we would like this change.


1. Strong sense of community. Edgemont and Bell View students are neighbors, friends and community members that attend churches together, Sandy's end of summer parties, playing at The Big Bear Park together and more. Our students and faculty are amazing! They are inclusive, friendly hard working. Edgemont and Bell View PTAs have started working together to make a seamless transition for everyone we can. We have seen and heard about students and faculty in both schools being inclusive and genuinely concerned for their neighbors, and we feel our students will be happier to help rather than feel elite or deprived for having ownership or not involved from lack of previously attending the building.  Therefore, we feel with the right administration, the faculty, students, parents and community as a whole will join together to create culture that will be extraordinary no matter the location. 
By being allowed to stay in our community, we are able to strengthen those bonds of friendship and community, and feel a stronger tie to our neighborhood, friends and community as a whole. The students living furthest to the East and South are approximately 1.1-1.5 miles away from the school, which continues puts them in walking distance of Bell View. The students furthest west and north will continue to be bussed because of crossing 700 E. and similarly across 9400 S. Bell View is already a school that is mostly bussed in, so their transportation won’t change.


2. Edgemont has a strong foundation of volunteers and parents that will help when needed. Staying in our neighborhood will encourage more parent volunteers and family participation. When families have to commute, it makes it harder and less desirable to join the school community. Many families may only have one or no cars making these things impossible when further away as well. 


3.Change is difficult for children regardless of the circumstances. The Bell View campus will be most inviting, familiar and will feel more like home to our students. We are all familiar with the building as we pass it going in and out of our neighborhood, so many of our students can continue to walk to school. Although we know portables will have to come in to house students in either scenario, allowing Bell View students to remain on Bell View Campus and Edgemont students joining them will give all of our students the most stability and least amount of change.  

4. Crescent View Middle School isn’t equipped for elementary students. Not only is it a big, dark and dreary building, but larger bathroom facilities for small people, lack of playgrounds, basketball hoops etc. make it an unfriendly place for children to go to school and can be scary for them as well. We hope no matter which school attends Crescent View Middle these concerns will be addressed even if it is only for 1 year. 1 year can change a student’s outlook on school for life. 


5. Commuting to Crescent View Middle school (11150 Green Ridge Dr, Sandy, UT 84070): Our commute time to school will take longer and our students’ day even longer. Our students start late as it is at 8:45-3:20 and will be getting home even later with bussing if the district places us at Crescent Middle School. We don’t want our students getting home as late or later than 4 pm. This causes students to be very tired and unable to contribute to home life, other extracurricular activities, relax and be a kid.
We also feel that by bussing more students to a further location more students will be absent. Many students walk or are driven to school making parents have a longer commute time. Children missing the bus may cause them to miss school altogether.


With the Salta Program placed at Peruvian Park, many students are already traveling further to school via their own transportation and with construction the students will need to be bussed regardless of where they attend, we feel it makes more sense to move them to Crescent View. We have a strong preference to stay in our community at Bell View. One point that was brought up was that the commute is longer for Peruvian Elementary. Although this is true, it is a 3-minute difference for Peruvian to travel from their current location to Crescent View (12 minutes) verses Bell View (9 minutes). This doesn’t seem to be as big of a difference as one would be led to believe.
 
6. Portables: The argument could be made that it is too expensive to bring in portables; however, no matter which school is brought in there will be portables. Edgemont and Bell View together have about 700 students and Peruvian has about 600 students. The difference in number of portable is not significant.

We are excited for the new changes and building and grateful for an opportunity to have a voice in this process. We are requesting that we stay in our neighborhood at Bell View campus during our transitional year of construction on the new White City School building. If for some reason the School Board has other reasons that we have not addressed that will be harmful for our students and would like us to go to Crescent Middle School for a year, please address these over the next few months, so that we can all be happy with our decision for the upcoming transitional year.

Thank your signing our petitioned and helping us stay in our neighborhood!

https://go.boarddocs.com/ut/canyons/Board.nsf/files/BJDMFC5B02A0/$file/Housing%20Options%20During%20Construction%2012-3-19.pdf
column48: Canyons School District School Board Nancy Tingey, Sandy City Mayor, Canyons School District Superintendent, Dr. Jim Briscoe, Steve Wrigley, Amber Shill, Mont Millerberg, Carleen Arnold, Amanda Oak...
column49: Our petition letter speaks for itself, but as a community we have a voice and we wish to be heard. Please allow Edgemont Elementary and Bell View Elementary to stay in our neighborhood. Thank you!

column33: Bring Back Johnny Depp to the Fantastic Beasts franchise
column35: [' accusations that <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> made against Johnny Depp have been revealed to be fake or innacurate and', ' ( <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> ) is still getting jobs in the same\xa0 industry without the same consequences . the woman']
column39: Bring Back Johnny Depp to the Fantastic Beasts franchise
column46: grand public: Bring Back Johnny Depp to the Fantastic Beasts franchise
column47:
In light of the recent events it seems very unfair that one of the most talented actors of the world is  asked to resign from a role for allegations RUMORS and not confirmed facts , lots of the accusations that Amber Heard made against Johnny Depp have been revealed to be fake or innacurate and still his career is suffering from these so called "facts " . Because of that I encourage people to NOT GO and watch the Fantastic Beasts future movies unless Johnny Depp is reinstated as the character Gellert Grindelwald as it was originally planned . It is the most  unfair that a rumored abusive man is suffering the movie industry's wrath all for a money reason whereas a confirmed  female abuser ( Amber Heard ) is still getting jobs in the same  industry without the same consequences . the woman has hurt him both physically and emotionally and it is barely spoken out because  the idea of a man hurt by a woman  is badly perceived in nowadays society but these things happen  everyday and sometimes for a long time . But No more it is time for the truth and it is time to give our support to this man for blessing us with his wonderful acting over the years , Johnny Depp isn't gonna give up the fight for what's right  so we should do the same and show Warner Bros company that what they did wasn't right 

#JusticeForJohnnyDepp
column49: Bring Back Johnny Depp to the Fantastic Beasts franchise

column11: Amber Rudd MP, Nigel Sinden, Clive Cook, Nick Perry, Peter Chowney, East Sussex County Council
column33: Save Our College Library
column35: [', additional expenses are often unaffordable. We need your help to get our voices <mark>heard</mark> in order to save']
column39: Save Our College Library
column46: Amber Rudd MP: Save Our College Library
column47:
East Sussex College has over 15,000 students attending. However, with the library in Ore campus threatening to close, many will go without essential resources. With the site specialising in engineering, IT and Higher Education, many students rely on this essential equipment to complete their courses and without it, we fear they will not get the chance. With fees of £3000 for our courses alone, additional expenses are often unaffordable. We need your help to get our voices heard in order to save our library, it's hard working staff and the chance of survival for students. We need your help in order to save it. 

Please sign and help enrich the lives of students at East Sussex College.
column48: Amber Rudd MP, Nigel Sinden, Clive Cook, Nick Perry, Peter Chowney, East Sussex County Council
column49: Save Our College Library

column33: SAVE ROSE
column35: [' some of you may have <mark>heard</mark>, our new property management company has decided to get rid of Rose to']
column39: SAVE ROSE
column46: norris and stevens: SAVE ROSE
column47: You probably thought things here at River Ridge Apartments could not get worse… we have an unacceptable parking space issue, the horrible mess of the construction fix from the developers mistakes, nights sweating to death due to the sewer smell outside and not wanting to open your windows, and of course the landslide caused by the landscaping crew / construction… things did indeed get worse! As some of you may have heard, our new property management company has decided to get rid of Rose to save themselves money. Currently her last day is Aug 15th, but we have the power to help save her job! Rose has made such an impact on myself and everyone I know around her with her positive energy and loving personality. She takes the time to get to know each of us and no one else here does that! She keeps the area safe at night by patrolling. She assists us to keep the upper lot just for the people that live here. She helps us up the hill when we are carrying our babies, our work bags, gym bags, groceries, or are just too damn tired from working all day to walk up a freaking hill to our apartment (since the parking here is absolutely ridiculous)! We may not have utilized her as much in the Summer because of the nice weather, but come Fall / Winter with the wind, rain, and cold, we will be begging for her back! So join us and help stop another big corporation from taking away someone’s job who not just needs it, but loves it! Sign our petition and tell management to keep Rose, the one and only thing this place ever got right!

column47: Lindy Ruff has been the head coach of the Buffalo Sabres for over 13 years. We need a change, we need a winning team that makes winning plays. We can no longer stand behind Lindy Ruff and his "pass pass pass on a powerplay with barley any shots" or "dump it into the zone, waste time and energy fighting to try and get the puck back" plays. Lindy was handed a stanley cup team made by Ted Nolan and he destroyed it.

column33: Cast Johnny Depp as Gold Roger in the Live Action One Piece Series
column35: ['As a result of the false accusations of domestic abuse spread by <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark>, Johnny Depp can no', ' proven that <mark>Heard</mark> HERSELF was the domestic abuser, while Depp was the victim.\nBut Depp will always be']
column39: Cast Johnny Depp as Gold Roger in the Live Action One Piece Series
column46: Netflix : Cast Johnny Depp as Gold Roger in the Live Action One Piece Series
column47:
As a result of the false accusations of domestic abuse spread by Amber Heard, Johnny Depp can no longer play Captain Jack Sparrow in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, despite it having been proven that Heard HERSELF was the domestic abuser, while Depp was the victim.

But Depp will always be Pirate King, and here’s a chance for the entire world to know it! Cast Johnny Depp as Gold Roger, the King of the Pirates, in the live action adaptation of the hit manga One Piece by Eiichiro Oda. He’s perfect for that role! He has the experience and even looks like Roger a bit! If we can get enough signatures for this petition, Netflix and Tomorrow Studios, who will be producing the show, will take notice! If we’re lucky enough, Oda himself might see this!

One Piece fans and Pirates of the Caribbean fans unite! Let’s make this a reality!

column33: HELP bring home my babies!        STOP CPS/COURT CORRUPTION!
column34: [' they are suffering from in these foster homes,  sign this petition! LETS BE <mark>HEARD</mark>! BRING THEM BABIES HOME!']
column39: HELP bring home my babies!        STOP CPS/COURT CORRUPTION!
column46: michael parson: PLEASE HELP BRING MY CHILDREN HOME! stop CPS and the corrupt system of family court!!
column47: Please help me bring my children back home to their innocent mother. Cps removed my kids from school without and warrant, court order ever being seen first, that was 11 days after they came into my home and declared my children safe to be home with me,then they remove them on hear say?? It just don't make since!! the allegations do not have any real evidence, and I have been cleared of any findings! My families rights were violated, my family has been treated very poorly, our case has been handled wrongfully and laws have been broken, my kids have been and still are being harmed in these temporary placement foster homes, information has been withheld from me pertaining my kids mental health, wellbeing, their physical, emotional health, their placement, educational, and medical, I am being refused my court ordered visits with my kids, cos has not done extreme measures to reunify, the court order was altered, not by the judge but by the worker and juvenile officer, and there was never a judge present to do so. We have been lied to there also is not a timeline to when me kids can come home and very little paperwork, I have been denied to speak with my kids and see them, I have been denied to get a copy of my file after requesting! Cps have denied to place my child closet and stated visits could be different cuz of how far they had placed him, the worker has very poor communication with me and only calls for drug screen, she also showed very unprofessional behaviors in from of witnesses and was made to leave the room, my family has not been giving a fair investigation nor a fair hearing what so ever, we are being lied to, we have not been giving the opportunity to give our side of story, to give our evidence, we are being handed a corrupt and wrong hearing, we have been in the dark not knowing what is happening at court or with our kids,  my kids are being neglected and abused, they are poorly supervised and not approving anything by myself before so so with my children, cps is denying my request, and breaking laws, my son's have been injured multiple times in these home been hit by a moving car while riding his bike, had access to a rooftop and was placed into a facility for poor supervision, my daughter and son had administered drugs and alcohol with I these homes, and were smoking vape cigarettes, I was denied by a worker when asked for them to do a wellbeing check on my kids, the very next day an investigator found that my son had been injured and needed to go to the hospital, if that worker would have listened my son would not of suffered! plus so so much more has happened, so many laws broke, violated, and wrongful doings have happened! Please contact me for further details and to help me get them back home asap!! my children were safe at home with me and not doing any of these things what so ever and cps takes them and now all these horrible things are happening with my children, they deserve to be home with their loving caring and worried mother! Please help us, so many more families could be impacted by this corruption and not even know it, these children deserve to be with their parents and not harmed. Please help bring my kids home to me, make an impact! Do something for the better good!!
column48: michael parson, Mike Henderson, Dale Wright, Roy Blunt, Josh Hawley, city of farmington,missouri mayor, Missouri State Senate, Kip Kendrick, Greg Hunt
column49: If you could possibly dedicate a few minutes of your time to this petition please? Our reason for this petition ,is to stop the corruption in the family courts system. help stop cps getting away with breaking all these laws, violating civil/human rights, taking/kidnapping innocent children, ripping innocent families apart, our children are being neglected, and abused in the foster care system, these homes and these people are suppose to be protecting our children, not abusing, neglecting, and putting them in harm's way, they are not supposed to be un-supervised in these homes, these children are being and administering drugs and alcohol under the child protective services care, these children do/ did not deserve to be taking from their parents/their home, to be the social workers are using indecent actions, breaking laws, and violating our rights! help me fight to get my children back home to their innocent parents, by signing this petition we can bring even more children home to innocent families! We can save so many childrens lives, and keep them from the harm and mental stability they are suffering from in these foster homes,  sign this petition! LETS BE HEARD! BRING THEM BABIES HOME!

column39: Hold elected officials accountable to the constitution.
column46: Oklahoma legislative branch: Hold elected officials accountable to the constitution.
column47:
I am reaching out to you regarding the murder of my brother Bart Jameson, on January 30, 2019. Brenda Burdue Savage, the woman who was arrested, admitted she shot Bart and eyewitness accounts reported she did so "for no reason". She was released on $100,000 bond the following day, January 31, 2019, by Special Judge Mindy Beare. The ADA Adam R.Scharn took it upon his personal judgment by the accused looks that she couldn’t afford the 100,000 bond so instead of like all other murder cases in Pittsburg county Oklahoma of higher bonds for murder, he didn’t even fight this low bond.Our family does not have money or clout in the area but Bart was a lifelong, active member of the Choctaw community, was raised and participated in ceremonial dances but above all deserves the respect allowed to capital murder.
The district attorney chuck Sullivan sent out an email advising his staff not to communicate with our family anymore. Thru an open records request we learned that not one employee has received any trading on Marcys law as stated in Oklahoma constitutional law. Merrill Williamson from the attorney general office , refused to hear my concerns and complaints regarding constitutional violations, will not answer emails or calls. Kim Zachary, Brandi Larue and  Amber sutter victims advocates for Pittsburg county District attorney Chuck Sullivan have been hostile and will never give the family any updates to this case as required by the Oklahoma constitution and Federal law.

Oklahoma legislators Nathan Dahm, Trey Caldwell, Larry Boggs, David Smith, Jim Grego, Tammy Townley, Warren Hamilton, Logan Phillips, Greg Treat. They have all blocked or refused to talk with us regarding violations of Oklahoma constitution and federal victims rights laws, James Langford and Mark Wayne Mullin staffs told us to not call back as this is not their responsibility.  Judge Tim mills also violated federal and the United States constitution in allowing the accused attorneys to take us victims to court and make us give personal social media accounts to to her. They didn’t even have to follow the companies rules regarding the release of our information. We was not advised of our rights by judge mills prior to court. Matter of fact not one time was we advised of our rights.

If we don’t fix these issues not and enforce victims rights law especially when its in The Oklahoma Constitution section 2 article 34 , then all we will see is more Government representatives not honoring their oath of office . Let me just ask if you lost a loved one would you want your voice heard and afforded the same rights as the accused.

column47:
We are accusing the Warner Brothers of "Boycott", but we are missing that the real responsible of this defamation on Johnny Depp are "THE JUDGE ANDREW NICOL " and "THE SUN" the tabloid newspaper.

I'm not happy lose Johnny Depp as Grindelwald, but The Warner Bros is an American multinational mass media and entertainment, they have a responsibility. Ethically they can't accept a man accused to be a" wife-beater".

I know 100% that Johnny Depp is innocent, and I think the Warner Brothers production and more other actors know and believe in Johnny Depp innocent.

It is a difficult argument and I hope Johnny Depp have his Justice.

I want to remember you that the real responsible of this defamation are JUDGE ANDREW NICOL and THE SUN the tabloid newspaper. If there isn't this defamation on Johnny Depp (to be a "wife-beater") Johnny Depp will continue to be our Grindelwald and the Warner Brothers never leave Johnny Depp for "Fantastic Beasts 3". 

Let we continue to struggle for Johnny Depp Justice with these real Hashtags:

✊#justiceforjohnnydepp �

✊#equalityjusticeunderlaw�

#amberheardisanabuserandliar

Why I write Equal Justice Under Law, because if you enter in a court IT MUST be write this sentence :"EQUALITY JUSTICE UNDER LAW"

SUMMARIZING THE HUMAN RIGHT ARTICLES

Article 1.
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. 

Article 2.
Everyone is entitled to all the rights and freedoms set forth in this Declaration, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF ANY KIND, such as Race, Colour, Sex, Language, Religion, Political or other opinion, national or social origin, property, birth or other status. 

If "EQUALITY JUSTICE UNDER LAW" Amber Heard must pay for what she done to Johnny Depp: kick, slap... and seventh a Johnny Depp finger + she must pay for the psychological abuse she is making on Johnny Depp.

REMEMBER "EQUAL JUSTICE UNDER LAW"

column39: APS Students Are Suffering! Bring Back ADS and Remove Colleen Tagle and Cara Malone
column46: Alamogordo Students and Schools Are Suffering! Remove Colleen Tagle and Cara Malone
column47:
Alamogordo Public Schools have once again found itself in a situation that is toxic for all the APS members, students, the parents, and the guardians. The community thought that a change in leadership would bring back the pride and integrity that the APS school district used to have. Boy were we wrong. The new leadership Kenneth Moore has only given his deputy superintendents more power to ruin the lives of the teachers, students, and community. That is why we the community is asking for Colleen Tagle and Cara Malone to be removed from the positions they have. Under their leadership, competent leaders and principals have left the district. Under their leadership, outstanding principals like Tina Spitzberg, Ryal McMurray, Alicia Egin, and Sandra Johnson lost their positions by being demoted. After being in the district for many years they were not a good fit as a leader. When they demoted the principals they put their own friends in the positions. They yell and bully those that they don’t like and think it is okay. There are tons of grievances and complaints that have been filed against these leaders, even the new superintendent because of the way they treat their employees. Even in the board meeting, the superintendent yelled at the people who were there. He thought it was okay to yell at everyone in a public forum and he did the same thing to his workers at the high school. Things will only get worse with these people leading the way.

They closed Academy Del Sol. They have been trying to close this school for a long time. This school gave students a chance to do better because they didn’t fit on or do good at the high school. Students who were told they were bad students and would never graduate worked hard at ADS and proved the high school principals and teachers wrong. Now they closed ADS down and moved the students into 1 hallway of the high school. ADS students can’t go into other parts of the school. They cut the teachers down to 3. The teachers were told they are not allowed to teach. They can only monitor students as they get their classes virtually. For lunch ADS students were made to sit outside in the hot sun and eat their lunch. This is not fair to these students. Why do they have to be discriminated against because Ms. Malone and Ms. Tagle don’t care about them? Dr. Moore said he would take care of the situation but nothing has really changed. He only says what everyone wants to hear to make himself look good. None of them intend to change things. They want to make it look like they are here for students but they only do things that will make themselves look good. Bring back ADS. These kids deserve it and need it!

Who do we have that we can talk to about it? They have remove Angie Callwalder from her seat as school board president. If you complain to the superintendent it does no good. The superintendent and Colleen are always together. She does more leading in this district than he does. They were friends in Florida and they are still friends here.

Kenneth Moore was unfortunately given the job by the school board but Colleen and Cara make all of the decisions and choices. He backs their choices with his yelling and unprofessional ways of acting. Their choices have made people’s lives a living nightmare and it will not end. It is their mission to get rid of staff, teachers, administrators, directors, assistants, and that they don’t like and will not bow down to them. We can’t afford to lose any more people. Our students already don’t have teachers to teach all of their classes. My children have substitutes in their classroom instead of teachers. Why? As teachers that have left because of how they were treated. There are teachers that will come back to the school district if they are not here. We need them to step aside so our teachers will come back and give our children the education they need.

These tyrants must be stopped. We are losing good staff everyday and they don’t care. We need to stand up to them and take back our school district and our students education back. I will stand up for my students education. Will you stand with me?
column48: Kurt Steinhaus, Nicole Maxwell, Katarina Sandoval, Richard Boss, Judy Rabon
column49: Alamogordo Students and Schools Are Suffering! Remove Colleen Tagle and Cara Malone Alamogordo public schools has always prided itself on integrity and kept the students the main thing. Because of the leadership in the district, the students are no longer the main thing. There is so much bullying, harassment, and nepotism happening it has caused great students, staff, teachers, administrators, directors, supervisors, and coordinators to leave the district. There is a 2nd petition that has been started asking that the leaders Collleen Tagle and Cara Malone of Alamogordo public schools be removed. Both petitions shows how oppressive this district and its leaders have become. It is not fair that the concerns and complaints from parents, guardians, students, and workers in Alamogordo Public Schools are never heard. I have sent multiple emails to school board members with concerns about this district and the leaders. I have emailed about worker treatment and the number of teachers that are quitting. I have never gotten any kind of response. When I did, I was told my email would be forwarded to the superintendents. Why is it being forwarded to the people that I have the complaint about? When there are complaints, the school board does not investigate or hold superintendents accountable. Last year the school board put out a statement that they will back their superintendents. Do they not realize that their superintendents are destroying the lives of students and teachers. Because they made the choice to not investigate, there is a huge teacher shortage and students aren’t getting the education they should get. There is a nationwide teacher shortage so that should be expected here. But the shortage in Alamogordo is greater than normal. Look at how many Alamogordo teachers have left Alamogordo to teach in Tularosa, Cloudcroft, Las Cruces, and Pecos Academy online. APS could use these great teachers but they will not come back under these conditions. The school board is giving the superintendents the freedom act in all types of unacceptable manners. The superintendents demote and fire administration that do not praise them. If any administrator says what they believe is best for their school, they are demoted and told they are not a good fit for the district anymore. How is it possible that good leaders that have been administers for several years and now they are no longer competent to run their schools or departments? It’s because they don’t bow down so they are removed. Some of these leaders are Tina Sptizberg, Ryal McMurray, Alicia Edgin, and Sandra Johnson. We can’t afford to lose any more of our leaders. At the board meeting Mr. Moore, raised his voice and yelled at the people in the audience more than once. The school board allowed him to do it. When he was the principal majority of his staff reported the same thing. Was anything ever investigated? No it wasn’t. The district has 9 EEOC complaints against it. Still no investigation by the school board. Staff members are looking for lawyers that will represent them because of the bullying. This has been told to the school board. Any investigation? Not one. The community elected these school board members to do what is best for our schools and kids. They have befriended the superintendents so they don’t hold them accountable for their actions. Because of this my children do not have teachers in all of their classrooms. Only full time substitutes. The teachers that they do have plan on leaving as soon as they have an offer for another job from a different school district or company. This is because they can’t take the yelling, bullying, and mistreatment from the superintendents. Even many of the Filipinos that were brought in to fill the teacher shortage are ready to find employment in other places because of leadership. Will it change? Not without help others and not until the superintendents are held accountable for their actions. Mr. Moore will never hold neither of them accountable. He and Ms. Tagle are very close. They have had a relationship in Florida before they both moved to Alamogordo. Since they have known each other for several years, he will support all her decisions and she will support his. Here are a few comments from the newest petition that have been left about the leadership. Even after bringing these comments and the bullying to the school board attentions they choose to not do anything. I hope this letter and these comments shine a big spot light on how school workers are being treated and the affect it is having on the kids. Petition 2 https://chng.it/YSTHLbtr ambet monreal I have been a victim of these school members And I support this petition Trista Pior Truthfully, it greatly saddens me that leaders allow themselves to mistreat and demean others in their circle. Ms. Tagle and Ms. Malone have been the cause of so many educators and staff leaving the District due to bullying. Soon there will be no one that will take teaching jobs in Alamogordo. Already the turnover rate is 1 to 2 years on new hires especially in Special education, elementary, and electives. Sam Laferriere The integrity of the school system is dwindling every day. We need someone who can put the children and the schools first above and beyond anything else. Coming from the state of Texas in the school systems in Texas, we have a lot to Lara and a lot of opportunities to be getting. This school system/board is an embarrassing display at best. Do better. Be better. Angela Scrivner Have never read a petition more on target. They all need to be gone. Michelle Charron The current school board does not care about its teachers, students or community. They have made that blatantly clear and they all need to be removed! Give these kids back a chance to an actual education not just a popularity contest! Shawn Edwards I agree with everything stated in this petition. This administration has ruined many careers. Sarah Davis I am also a victim to this kind of treatment. I was yelled at and verbally reprimanded because I asked a question about a process. I wasn’t asking to create problems. I asked because I needed clarification. Amber Gray Because there's a whole bunch of corrupt crap going on and it needs to be changed

column39: Dear Home Secretary: Please Pay for Therapy and Compensation for Victims and Survivors!
column46: Money for Therapy and Compensation for Victims and Survivors!
column47:
HM Treasury should make funds available for victims of sexual abuse, miscarriages of justice and other white collar crimes, to indicate that the Government encourages victims to come forward:

1. courts have to deal with McKenzie Friends helping 'Litigants in Person', because too many honest citizens have been victimised and traumatised by supposedly ethical professionals;

2. there don't seem to be enough honest and fair courts to sentence all criminals and not enough prisons to hold them; see Bent Lawyers and Cops;

3. the National Inquiry into Sexual Abuse 'takes stock': therapy for survivors but prison for abusers won't take away the damage done to survivors;

4. snatching children for 'possible emotional risk' is the most heinous of all white collar crimes - but trends have been rising since 1994 according to official statistics;

5. institutionalised removal for the purpose of abuse are the tip of an iceberg of white collar criminality, creating child and adult victims of fraudulent bankruptcies, faked home repossessions, false imprisonment and avoidable deaths in their families who are all waking up to the gap between what they say [justice and fairness] and what they do: injustice, oppression, intimidation and violence. See Victims Unite!

As a minimum, money should pay for therapy of victims and abusers.

  • See "I measured Love by how much Pain someone could take from me."

As an optimum, money should truly compensate for emotional, physical, mental, financial and legal damages done. 

By way of example of the 'state of victimisation', some evidence is on:-

  • VICTIMS UNITE with over 3,400 followers and more than 570,000 visitors since August 2010;
  • NATIONAL INQUIRY into ORGANISED, ORCHESTRATED and HISTORIC ABUSE with over 2,600 followers and 58,000 visitors since July 2014;
  • PUNISHMENT without CRIME with over 3,000 followers and 102,000 hits since April 2012;
  • VOLUNTARY PUBLIC INTEREST ADVOCACY with over 2,100 followers and 85,000 hits since February 2012;
  • DOSSIER of ONLINE EVIDENCE in support of our petition to the EU Parliament:
  • Abolish Adoptions without Parental Consent which, after a fact finding mission and Parliamentary debate changed its title to STOP the Forced Removal of Children by Social Services - across all EU Member States - with over 6,300 signatures; 
  • CHILDREN SCREAMING to be HEARD.

INDIVIDUAL CASES

  • FALSE IMPRISONMENT of FLYING VET - 1,700 followers and 69,000 visits since August 2010;
  • PILOT POISONED by AIR FUMES and subsequent HOUSE THEFT - 1,800 followers and 9,000 visits since August 2013;

Child Removals

  • The Nigerian Musas whose 7 children were taken by Haringey Council, the last one at birth in prison, before they were deported; the oldest daughter was molested by the son of the foster 'carers'; another daughter complained about being taken to dark places where there are only men; the son asked "Mummy, what is paedophilia?" - 1,500 followers and 87,000 visits since July 2011;
  • The Portuguese Pedros whose 5 children were taken by Lincoln Council - 2,000 followers and 21,000 visits since November 2013;
  • Phil Thompson whose 3 greatgrandchildren were taken by Walsall Council - 7,000 visits since October 2013;
  • Latvian Laila Brice's daughter was taken by Merton Council - 1,600 followers and 7,200 visits; 
  • US Melissa Laird's son was taken by Barnet Council and found unsuitable for adoption, after she was falsely criminalised and deported - 1,700 followers and 15,000 visits since September 2013;
  • The Lithuanian mother whose child was given to his father despite proven sexual abuse - 1,000 followers and 2,400 visits since June 2014. 

Child Pornography

  • Anecdotal evidence tells us that over 90% of people accused of child porn will eventually plead guilty;
  • Spotlight on historic abuse - with over 1,425,000 hits since February 2013;
  • The Cabal: one of many articles about 'global elite abuse' on Aangirfan;

Satanic Ritual Abuse

column48: The Rt Hon Amber Rudd MP
column49:
Please acknowledge the emotional, physical and mental pain caused by fifty shades of abuse and crime. 

You can't continue to preach and practise 'austerity', while more and more people wake up to the dishonesty of the money system. 

You can't continue to oppress and intimidate victims, while more and more people realise who the abusers and criminals are. 

Start coming clean, at least with money, while everybody's conscience remains what it is.

A French proverb says: there is no pillow so soft as a clear conscience.

column39: Getting Justice For Johnny Depp
column46: Getting Justice For Johnny: Getting Justice For Johnny Depp
column47:
Johnny Depp has been accused of a horrendous crime and because of this he has lost several jobs. “Disney” fired him from the POTC (Pirates of the Caribbean) movies because of the claims against him, created by non other than the, infamous, “Amber Heard.” Amber physically and mentally abused Johnny Depp so badly that she nearly killed him. She threw a vodka bottle at him and severed his finger so severely that he had to have it surgically sewn back on, she gave him black eyes, she shat in his bed! She has humiliated him in public many times. He sent out several “SOS” signals and no one did a thing to help him until it was too late. 

Johnny Depp has been an icon for over 30 years and to shame him of these crimes that have been placed against him even after the truth came out is absurd. We are talking about a man here who has had an incredible reputation for years and whom children have looked up too and suddenly their childhood hero is being accused of abuse by a woman who has been abusing him. 

Enogh is Enough Johnny has had something very wrong done to him and he not only deserves a public apology from the entire nation, he also deserves to get back his reputation! He’s an incredible man and is so loved. WE WANT HIM BACK!

column33: JUSTICE FOR JOHNNY DEPP
column35: [' to Mr Depp\'s reputation, labelling him a "wife beater". Supposedly, the victim was actress <mark>Amber</mark>', ' <mark>Heard</mark>, a woman arrested previously for domestic violence, his ex wife. However, as seen in the trial']
column39: JUSTICE FOR JOHNNY DEPP
column46: Royal Courts of Justice, London: Justice For Johnny Depp
column47:
Johnny Depp is a victim.

This is apparently something the justice system refuses to accept, based on their rebuttal of the star in his recent libel trial against British tabloid The Sun, a source notorious for their constant misinformation. 

The article The Sun released has been unfairly damaging to Mr Depp's reputation, labelling him a "wife beater". Supposedly, the victim was actress Amber Heard, a woman arrested previously for domestic violence, his ex wife. However, as seen in the trial, the truth is quite the contrary. 

Mr Depp has put forth witnesses, recordings, photographs and other sources of evidence, all of which has significant weight to it, in opposition to Heard's mere claims and weak sources. It has unravelled a horrific cycle of abuse that he has suffered at the hands of his former wife. To simply turn a blind eye to this evidence is pure ignorance.

Now, he has suffered an atrocious act of injustice. 

On November 2nd, a judge, notably one with ties to Heard's legal team, ruled in favour of The Sun, with little consideration for any word said or put forth by Depp, leading the media to spotlight the abuser as a martyr for domestic violence survivors and the victim as a soulless monster.

The cost of this significantly flawed and unbalanced judgement would be significant for Depp, a man known by friends and the public to be incredibly kind hearted in both his nature and his actions, as well as his career and his family, with him already being forced to stand down from his role as Gellert Grindelwald in the "Fantastic Beasts" series of films by Warner Brothers Studios. This simply will not do.

Johnny Depp must have justice. Nobody deserves such treatment, even if they are a powerful male in Hollywood. The highly misleading perception that only women are victims of domestic violence is being fueled through what is happening to Depp and that's not only unfair for him, but for every other man who has had their life punctured by domestic violence.

Not only must Johnny Depp be declared innocent, due to the overwhelming evidence in his favour, but he must be offered his role as Grindelwald back, as well as that of Captain Jack Sparrow on Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, after heavy rumours of replacement. His unjust removal from these projects sends an extremely negative message to male DA sufferers and survivors. However, displaying Depp's innocence and earing him the justice he deserves is obviously the primary objective of this petition. 

We are not fighting for him because of his stardom and our admiration of his acting. It is simply the right thing to do in this situation. Johnny Depp deserves so much better than this. 

Does someone who

- Called him a "f***ing baby" and taunted him that he would be unable to convince people of the abuse he received from her

- Admitted to hitting him and lying on various recordings

- Violently assaulted him, verbally and physically 

- Faked bruises and cuts with make up, with them disappearing the day after pictures were taken

Deserve victory?

I don't think so.

We don't think so.

column39: Justice For Johnny Depp!
column46: Justice For Johnny Depp!
column47:
On November 2, 2020, Johnny Depp lost a court case against the Sun who called him a ‘Wife Beater.’ He sued them for libel/slander. The ‘wife beater,’ is in reference to his ex-wife, Amber Heard, who accused Johnny Depp of beating/abusing her since 2016. London Court had taken this case. Recently, there were some audio tapes of Heard and Depp fighting that were released, seeming to prove him to be innocent and proving Heard had lied when she was actually the one abusing Depp. Even his exes before Heard defended him. If you listen to the audio, you can hear Heard saying, “No one will believe you,” to Depp.

On November 6, 2020, Depp announced on Instagram that Warner Bros. asked him to resign his role of Gellert Grindelwald in “Fantastic Beast” franchise. 

just recently, Disney announced that they’re dropping Johnny Depp too! That is not right!

Petition for Johnny Depp to get his role back, for Disney to rehire him, and for high court to penalize The Sun and Heard for slander/libel/ and defamation. Since there’s a lack of evidence that Depp really abused Heard. There is more evidence that Heard is the abuser:

Amber Heard dares Johnny Depp to 'tell the world' he was victim of domestic abuse: 'See who believes you'

The Audio Of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Arguing
column48: Boris Johnson, Hon. Andrew Nicol, Warner Brothers, Walt Disney
column49: I ask you to re-evaluate all the evidence that were used. And provide justice for Mr. Depp since he is innocent. If he was not, he wouldn’t be where he is now.

column46: Warner Brothers: JohnnyDeppisGrindelwald
column47:
#Justiceforjohnny

Asking Johnny Depp to resign the role of Grindelwald is just not fair. Im a fan of the wizarding world and no one can reace Johnny for this role . Firstly he lost a case which he had to win, and if that's not enough his career is in trouble. Meanwhile,  Amber Heard is still a part of Aquaman despite solid evidence that was released (the phone call) which is bizarre. This is absolute Hypocrisy and I need your help to force Warner Bros recast Johnny Depp. I am starting this petition from India which only shows how much he is loved throughout the world,  so from wherever you are, let's all stand together and support our fallen superstar  him rise again. He is a man with a beautiful heart and we need justice to be served. Justice for Johnny.

column39: Change NYS Blue Light Laws for Volunteers
column46: Firefighters: Change NYS Blue Light Laws for Volunteers
column47: I believe all volunteers in NYS should have access to BLUE lights- not just for "certified interior firefighters". I started as a volunteer firefighter since I was 16 years old for Arlington Fire District Station #5. I have been running amber lights ONLY when I am stopped per 44.3 in the law section of amber lights of New York State. I use these amber lights but NOBODY slows down. It seems to be that it's too casual for other drivers who don't slow down when they see these lights. What if I need to walk out into traffic on Route 9 in Poughkeepsie NY? However, in New York State, I have heard from MULTIPLE people, online and offline that New York State's light laws are in fact PAST DUE and need updating. I want EVERY VOLUNTEERS OPINION on this. Should we have POV's like in other states? This will speed up response times as well for us volunteers to get the rigs out on calls. Here's some proof that we will be able to. At Croft Corners Fire Company, Ladder 45 nearly never goes out on calls because it's run by volunteers who are working and the people who are responding to answer the calls are in the paid career engines within seconds and if they need backup, they rely on us. Most of the time volunteers can't get there quickly enough and that's why we should have POV's (POV means Personally Owned Vehicle and it's where firefighters get in their personal vehicles and run lights and sirens to the call they are heading to.) in New York State. I am open to all suggestions but the only hope of this petition is to get New York State's blue light laws updated as well as all the lights in not just Dutchess County but New York State. So please, even if you ARE NOT a firefighter please sign this petition so we can respond to YOUR calls at a faster rate then before.

column39: change the way the SIA is run.
column46: Theresa May MP: change the way the sia is run by b
column47:
as we are all fully aware the security industry authority may look ok to the outside eye ,, but we the workers of the industry know its not .. now we all pay £220 for our licenses and expect a reasonable service and a smooth transaction when renewing and upgrading for a low percent this happens but i predict for around 90% its not the case.. it seems the sia are quick to take our money but can leave people waiting months and months for evan a reply never mind a acceptance or decline..

we want to change how the sia is run with more funding / training / more bodys anwsering phones.. 

also we need the sia to actually be going out to check on companys and make sure there activities are legitimate.

ive been sia for 4 years now and never ever heard of a sia inspector never mind meeting any!!

to many rogue company's playing on the edge with hours/pay/ and basic stuff like on site facilities when guarding locations..

its a joke and i for one  am sick to my back teeth of how we are used..

door supervisors were on £10-£15 per hour 15 years ago why are we still on the same..

soon enough the nmw will be on our doors and that is not good!!

thank you for reading this now sign the form on the next page and lets get what we deserve..

thank you

regards

oliver carter

column33: Put an end to cars loitering/stunting in Halifax Shopping Centre parking garages
column35: [' <mark>heard</mark> from the middle to bottom or Cook Avenue and occurs anywhere from 7pm until midnight. The HSC']
column39: Put an end to cars loitering/stunting in Halifax Shopping Centre parking garages
column46: Halifax Shopping Centre : Put an end to cars loitering/stunting in Halifax Shopping Centre parking garages
column47:
For the past 2 years, our community has been calling the Halifax Shopping Centre security and Halifax Regional Police to report the nightly occurrences of 5-30+ vehicles loitering in the HSC parking garages near entrance 6. This has GOT to stop! Night after night we hear them shoot off firecrackers, rev their engines, speed around the outside of the HSC, and skid their tires, etc. This can be heard from the middle to bottom or Cook Avenue and occurs anywhere from 7pm until midnight. The HSC security and HRP do nothing to stop it and our concerns have been ignored. 
Our community houses babies, children, working parents, and many elderly, and the drivers of these vehicles have brushed off our concerns and continued to be disrespectful to our attempts and requests to have them stop. 
Sharon Pottie has been in conversation with our local MLA who has advised we start this petition to have the HSC chain off the entrances to the parking garages at a specified time and/or put speed bumps in around the parking lots to reduce the speed of the vehicles, which honestly seems like something that should have happened long ago. 
Please support us in signing this petition! 
Thank you in advance for your support! :)

column11: Donald J. Trump, New York Audubon, National Audubon Society, Environmental Protection Agency, U​.​S. Fish and Wildlife Service
column33: Stop Trump from eliminating wild bird protection!
column35: [' enough voices against this have been <mark>heard</mark>. Please sign this petition to help stop Trump from moving forward!!\xa0']
column39: Stop Trump from eliminating wild bird protection!
column46: Donald J. Trump: Stop Trump from eliminating wild bird protection!
column47:
Trump is moving forward with scaling back a century-old law that protects American wild bird species, which could result in the deaths of billions of birds. Birds are already in a steep decline in America, and with this action by Trump, entire populations of birds could require protection under the Endangered Species Act, or even go extinct. 

Since the Migratory Bird Treaty Act (MBTA), so many more threats than hunting and poaching of birds have arose (ex. birds flying into oil pits, mining sites, wind turbines, etc.), and this act is the EXACT thing that Trump is trying to override. Industrial companies must comply with the MBTA so that birds flying through these areas with things like wind turbines are not subject to being in danger. Again, this is what Trump is trying to override. 

Thankfully, New York Audubon and other environmental conservation groups have challenged this, but not enough voices against this have been heard. Please sign this petition to help stop Trump from moving forward!!
column48: Donald J. Trump, New York Audubon, National Audubon Society, Environmental Protection Agency, U​.​S. Fish and Wildlife Service

column39: Boycott Aquaman 2 & fantastic beasts 3
column46: Warner Brothers: Boycott Aquaman 2 & fantastic beasts 3
column47:
As most of you know 2020 was a pretty rough year and in the mists of that was the legal case between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. Now Despite evidence given in the case by Johnny to show and suggest that he was the victim and not to mention the published tapes of amber admitting to 'hitting' him, she still won the trial. Now You only have to Google her name to find out that she's been arrested for 'misdemeanor domestic violence'. So how is it that Amber still gets to reprise her role as Mera in aquaman 2, yet Johnny has been axed of his role as Grindelwald in fantastic beasts 3?

I know the media are claiming it's because Amber Heard has a contract with Warner bros and so that they cannot fire her but so did Johnny. He had a contract for his role as Grindelwald and yet they still managed to fire him. To me this shows that Warner bros not only agrees with abuse and domestic violence but also sides with a woman who has a repitation for it. Johnny has proved his innocence with solid evidence multiple times but due to the fact he's Male, he's been silenced. This is a huge problem amongst itself and it's time we make a change by boycotting aquaman 2 and fantastic beasts 3.

This shows Warner bros that we STAND by Male victims of domestic abuse/violence and we don't side with Amber Heard. This also shows that no one else can replace Johnny's grindelwald and that we want him back! .  I know a close friend that's been falsely accused of domestic violence, he felt hopeless and like sexism was a factor.  That's what's happening here too so Please sign the petition to not watch these films when they are released and shown #justiceforjohnnydepp !

column39: An Open Letter to the Film Lovers of Los Angeles: Cinefamily and the Chance for Change
column46: LA WEEKLY: An Open Letter to the Film Lovers of Los Angeles: Cinefamily and the Chance for Change
column47:
Over the past month, the “Rise and Fall of Cinefamily," with its allegations of sexual assault and a toxic work culture, has been a deeply troubling saga for those of us in the Los Angeles film community to observe. The recent extremely well-written LA Weekly piece of that name has prompted us to write this open letter and add a voice to the conversation. It is a voice which we haven’t yet heard, addressing the second part of the headline—“Can It Be Saved?”

An important preface: We want to be clear on our stand on the allegations. We believe the victims. If you haven’t read Amber Tamblyn’s amazing New York Times op-ed on that subject, it's perfect, it leaves nothing further to be said. We are at a time in history where women are refusing to remain silent any longer about the discrimination and harassment we suffer every day, and that is a huge step forward and took a lot of bravery from all concerned.

As we can see from recent events with the Alamo Drafthouse, the issue of unsafe cultures for women in repertory cinema exhibition is much bigger than Cinefamily. Calling it out wherever it exists sends a strong message that this type of behavior is no longer tolerated in our community. It should be heard loud and clear, by everyone in power, and remembered when they are thinking about what kind of organizational cultures they are creating in their movie theaters or anywhere else. Don’t make it one where women, LGBTQ, and people of color aren’t safe, valued and respected. You will not get away with it any longer.

That being said, as we look to the future, it prompts the question—What happens to Cinefamily now? Namely—we are hearing that behind the scenes, it’s not a discussion about what culture a reopened theater should have. Rather, Cinefamily is in mortal danger, with the most likely scenario being it doesn’t come back at all. Partially because it’s not clear whether there would be an audience to come back to.

What we haven’t yet heard mentioned as part of this ongoing dialogue is: If all the things that were good about Cinefamily are lost to the L.A. community as a result of this situation, the misogynists who were forced out still win in the end. Because we, the community, are losing something we liked as a result of what they did.

We’ll just take a moment to list some of our favorite things about Cinefamily for the past 10 years:

  • First and foremost, the community, which was the closest to a 50/50 gender ratio of any repertory theater in town.
  • That it provided a place for non-film-historian-type people like comedians, artists and musicians to do shows involving film and pop-culture with a lot of freedom and creativity.
  • That its approach mixing the highbrow and the lowbrow provided a powerfully juxtaposed mental space to think about genre things critically, and make intellectual things viscerally enjoyable and get more people interested in them.
  • And that, whatever was going on backstage, the actual movies shown were profusely diverse and didn’t exclude female, LGBTQ or POC voices at all.

If those things disappear because of negative influences, the punishment for the actions of the few is going to be executed on the innocent many. In our opinion—That’s unfair.

Even more powerfully—if Cinefamily DID somehow manage to come back with the above strengths, and with a newly healthy culture for the people who work and watch movies there—It would actually be a huge “in your face” to all of the misogyny in repertory movie-going nationwide.

If Cinefamily just gets destroyed and not rebuilt, while yes, it sends a great message that we don’t tolerate misogyny, it’s not as powerful a message as rebuilding it into what we do want to see would be. And that is not going to happen without the will of the public demanding its survival.

We've created this open letter to find out if that will is indeed there. If it is, we believe all things are possible. Your signature, or lack thereof, is your power to affect how this story will end: in destruction, or in redemption.

Sincerely,

Debbie Jhoon, Tina Huang, and Karla Mosley, 1:1 Productions
column49: An Open Letter to the Film Lovers of Los Angeles: Cinefamily and the Chance for Change

column33: Funko Needs To Make A Dead Boromir Pop Figure
column35: [' willing to take the time to make their voice <mark>heard</mark> would like to ask Funko Toy Company to include a']
column39: Funko Needs To Make A Dead Boromir Pop Figure
column46: Funko Toy Company: Funko Needs To Make A Dead Boromir Pop Figure
column47:
After waiting patiently for Funko to feed us merchandise-starved Lord of the Rings fans, Funko Toy Company has graciously thrown us the bone of a brandy-new line of Pop figures, as well as two lovely figures from their Rock Candy line. 

Excellent start!!

But, we want more...

...Not only more, we would like you to continue doing a good job of making the Pop figures while avoiding little inconsistencies, such as "Sick Frodo," who hasn't even reached Rivendell yet, is holding the light of Eärendil despite the fact that Galadriel doesn't gift it to him until the Fellowship is leaving Lothlorien. (though I suppose it hardly matters since no can seem to find that figure anyways, but I digress.)

Ah, yes, nit-picking, I realize.

However, we are most pleased with the Pops you have made so far (No, really, they're wonderful! I love how amazing the Balrog looks!) and would hope very much that you plan to make more. But, just to make sure you don't leave out an important part of the story, we would to ask that you include in your next line up, a Pop figure of dead, arrow-filled Boromir.

"BUT, THAT'S SO INAPPROPRIATE!!"

Oh?

Is it really?

Consider the following two points please.

Your company is not above making a Pop figure of a dead or gravely injured character. Examples include Orphan Black's Rachel Duncan, Dead Jon Snow from Game of Thrones, Monty Python and the Holy Grail's Black Knight "Flesh Wound" variant, Zombie Kenny from South Park, and then there was that little Dead Herschel gem from the Walking Dead you guys released...seriously though? Are you ever going to make a figure of Carol holding a tray of cookies?

Anyways, the point is obvious, this is not new ground for Funko.

The second point is, do it for Sean Bean! 

Seriously, this master of dying on film has publicly stated that his favorite death scene EVER! is him dying as Boromir. Can you really blame him? Despite the internet's salty memes about him dying, is was a very heroic death. He wasn't the bad guy, getting what was coming to him, or just a good guy who got screwed over by an evil, bratty, monster of a king. He's a man who died trying to redeem himself for his failings. 

So, myself, and anyone else willing to take the time to make their voice heard would like to ask Funko Toy Company to include a Dead Boromir in the next line of Lord of the Ring Pop figures you release...since, after all, you are going to be making more, right?....Riiiiight?? ::hint hint"

Also, if you do make him, please consider sending a figure to Sean Bean himself. He would probably enjoy that very much.

Thank you for time, my precious. ;)

column39: A book answering ALTA Azulas story after Smoke and Shadow
column46: Nickelodeon: A book answering ALTA Azulas story after Smoke and Shadow
column47:
Fans of Avatar - The Last Airbender will know that the stroy doesnt end when the series did. We have 5 books that follow on from the ending, The Promise, The Search, The Rift, Smoke and Shadow and North and South. These books answers the question about Zukos mother and what happened to her, as well as the aftermath the war had on all the nations.

Zuko allows Azula to help in the search of their mother but after her appearance in Smoke and Shadow, theres no real closure of her story line. She just vanishes and theres no mention of her story or happenings in Legend of Korra. I understand that Azula won't have a big role in ALOK, which is why the books are important to the ATLA fans to get said closure. 

We have Zukos story, and later this year Suki's story will be released but we really need Azula's story. (And Sokka's story as we need to know adult Sokkas adventures)

I would love to get these books in production and released so I'm asking all fans from the Earth Kingdom to the Fire Nation, from the Water Tribes to Republic City to sign this petition to get the answers we need. 

Azula and Sokka's story needs to be heard, and i'm sure we can come together to get the answers we need. 

Please sign this petition and help ATLA fans get the closure we need
