column35: ['There has been a petition circling around to remove <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> from Aquaman 2 because of the old']
column39: Let women thrive in Hollywood
column46: Warner Brothers: Let women thrive in Hollywood
column47: There has been a petition circling around to remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2 because of the old news with Johnny Depp. My petition? Keep her in. Why are women often tied up to their past marriages? Every woman is her own person and should not be defined or identified by their former husbands. Also, believe women. But wherever you stand on that debate, looking at her actual acting, she's an amazing actor that adds a layer of depth to the first Aquaman; there's no reason to take her out.

column33: Longer Lunch Time For Students!
column35: [' only my kids but other to say they didnt have enough time to finish there lunch.\xa0\nI have <mark>heard</mark> this']
column39: Longer Lunch Time For Students!
column46: Government: Longer Lunch Time For Students!
column47:
Our children do not have a long enough lunch for there school day! It brakes my heart to hear not only my kids but other to say they didnt have enough time to finish there lunch. 

I have heard this many times amd as a parent hearing your child say they are so hungry when they come home from school because they couldnt finish there lunch in because they didnt have enough time brakes my heart. The avarage lunch for students is about 20 minutes and that time starts at the bell not when every child has got there food! So by the time some stand in line get there food and then finally sit down some are left with only 10 minutes or less to eat. 

Now it's deffently not healthy to eat fast and it is in no way safe!! There children and yes some may get distracted while talking or what not but lunch has always been short. As a child i remember just eating and not talking much because i new i didnt have a lot of time to finish my lunch. 

If a child is hungry durring the day that is also going to affect there attitude there focus and over all health. 

Giving students a longer lunch means everyone gets to eat without rushing and actually finish there meal!  Doing this not only will benifit thr students but the teachers as well! 

We need longer lunch in our schools for our children!! Please help me stand up and be a voice for children!!!! Lets give our children more time to eat there lunch!!!!

column33: Justice for Johnny Depp
column35: [' through a court case with his ex-wife <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>heard</mark>. There is already a petition online to get her', ' the past, but we all have. His ex-wife <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>heard</mark> has also falsely accused him of beating her, and']
column39: Justice for Johnny Depp
column46: 20th Century Fox: Justice for Johnny Depp
column47: So I am creating a petition to serve justice for Johnny Depp. Recently he lost a liability case with Britain’s New Sun. He has been going through a lot this year not only that, but he has also been through a court case with his ex-wife Amber heard. There is already a petition online to get her removed from Aquaman 2. There is also another petition online to get Johnny Depp hired back on to the set of fantastic beasts and where to find them 3. I highly encourage all of you to sign both of those petitions, and I highly encourage all of you to sign this one, as well. Johnny Depp is one of the most selfless, loving, caring, kind hearted, gentle souls in the world. He has made some mistakes in the past, but we all have. His ex-wife Amber heard has also falsely accused him of beating her, and in reality, she is the one who put her hands on him. I personally believe that also Warner Brother Studios isn’t being fair to him, at all. He has gotten more crap this year than most people have. So like I said, I highly encourage all of you to please sign the two previous petitions I listed above. And I highly encourage you to please sign this one. This man deserves all of our love, and he deserves all of our support. Justice for Johnny Depp. Johnny Depp has helped more people than we can even begin to imagine or count. Now, it’s time for us all to stand together as one, and to finally help him.

column39: Fight with Johnny Depp
column46: People: Fight with Johnny Depp
column47: I am tired of watching women get away with abuse towards men. Men can be victims too. It's time to speak up and make our voices heard. We stand by any victim of abuse. Amber Heard has evidence of being abusive towards Johnny Depp and other men in her life, but yet no one is taking away her career. Johnny deserves his roles and I will not sit back and let his life be controlled by her. Please help me in defending this innocent man.

column33: Higher Pay for Guthrie Public School Cafeteria Staff
column35: [' the cafeteria staff of G.P.S. They need a voice, and we believe you can help them be <mark>heard</mark>. Thank you, <mark>Amber</mark> Rains.\xa0']
column39: Higher Pay for Guthrie Public School Cafeteria Staff
column46: Jason Murphey: Higher Pay for Guthrie Public School Cafeteria Staff
column47: Hello, as a graduate of Guthrie High School and a daughter of a mother who has worked for Guthrie Public Schools for the last 20 years, I believe all the staff of the cafeteria should be given a decent wage increase. The staff is only paid once a month and can hardly make ends meet. I feel it is the responsibility of our State Representatives to uphold the integrity of our Constitution by creating equal opportunities for all. It would be greatly appreciated if the State of Oklahoma can propose a compromise of competitive wages for the cafeteria staff of Guthrie Public Schools. These women and men work hard, and give back to the community by being a positive influence to these students who come through their line during lunch hours; not to mention the many times they have helped students buy lunches from their own pocket for students who couldn't afford to eat. Working in the cafeteria is a rewarding job and they deserve to make more then what they bring home. For instance, my mom who only makes $700.00 a month before taxes, the struggles she has endured (as a single mother of three) for the last 20 years while working for the Guthrie Public School system, and she has done so without complaint. That's why I'm asking you Mr. Murphey, to do something about the economic dysfunction of workers pay within Guthrie Public Schools. The staff has asked for raises and has talked to individuals higher up, yet their voices go unheard and the passion they adhere every day goes unrecognized. Reform has to start from somewhere. I'm asking you to regulate this matter by simply using your expertise so the staff of G.P.S. can live a more sustainable life. Thank you for Representing Oklahoma, I have optimism that you will take a stand and fight for the cafeteria staff to help get these women and men a raise they so desperately deserve! I write this on behalf of my mother and the rest of the cafeteria staff of G.P.S. They need a voice, and we believe you can help them be heard. Thank you, Amber Rains.
column49: Higher Pay for Guthrie Oklahoma Public School Cafeteria Staff

column35: [' would Elon musk( one of <mark>amber</mark> hearts ex’s) take johnny depp’s side, I believe because he knows what', ' <mark>heard</mark> is capable off but wants to help Johnny depp\nand I bet my soul Helen bonham carter and Tim Burton']
column39: #justiceforjohnnydepp
column46: The Sun: #justiceforjohnnydepp
column47:
Johnny depp is not a wife beater, the evidence was faked we all know that, but Johnny depp shouldn’t have to pay for it with his career, his appearance in movies, or his life. 

Warner bros. Has kicked him out of the upcoming fantastic beast, it’s only a matter of time before they do the same for more movies

growing up I’ve watched ever Johnny depp movie out there, and can say he isn’t a wife beater, someone like actors working with him, or even directors would have said something.

Also why would Elon musk( one of amber hearts ex’s) take johnny depp’s side, I believe because he knows what heard is capable off but wants to help Johnny depp

and I bet my soul Helen bonham carter and Tim Burton( the two people he mainly worked for/with) could tell you he is NOT a wife beater.

the court justice system that falsely accused him (the sun in Britain) should look at every thing again cus somewhere in there someone was either paid to say something or they missed something 

im no one special, just a person who believes Johnny depp couldn’t/ wouldn’t do anything like that, 

ps. His ex girlfriend, Winona Ryder also stands by his side saying he’s not a wife beater

i stand with Johnny depp following evidence,...will you stand with me?

Please sign and help our beloved Johnny Depp.
column49: #justiceforjohnnydepp

column35: [' accountable. I also believe that Chris Brown and <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> should be held accountable for their respective crimes.', ', nose and biting him, however after her arrest he refused to press charges. I believe that with <mark>Amber</mark>']
column39: Emma Roberts is a domestic abuser and should be canceled.
column46: Hollywood: Emma Roberts is a domestic abuser and should be canceled.
column47: In 2013 Emma Roberts was arrested in Montreal, Canada for blooding her boyfriend's, Evan Peters, nose and biting him, however after her arrest he refused to press charges. I believe that with Amber Heard's situation shining a new light on the fact that men that are subjected to domestic violence as well, we have all realized that men need to be advocated for better. This is a genderless crime and all victims of this crime should be advocated for. Regardless of however much attention this gets, we should not let this get swept under the rug. I realize the chances of her actually getting "canceled" are slim, but I do hope we start setting a precedent as a culture and hold celebrities accountable. I also believe that Chris Brown and Amber Heard should be held accountable for their respective crimes.

column46: Warner Brothers: Have Jason Momoa stand with Johnny Depp.

column33: Bring back king Soopers white mac and cheese
column35: [' bring it back my cravings are hard core for this mac and cheese! Who is with me!? I have <mark>heard</mark> this mac']
column39: Bring back king Soopers white mac and cheese
column46: King soopers : Bring back king Soopers white mac and cheese
column47: I am the biggest snob when it comes to mac and cheese!! I have been going to my local king Soopers for the last 2 years for their white mac and cheese in the deli department and recently I have found out they discontinued my favorite Mac and cheese!!! I found out they discontinued this delicious cheesey treat due to it being too expensive to make, if it is great mac and cheese charge me more it was already $5.99  for a large if you need to charge me $10 I’ll pay it! It was convenient to just go to the store and get this delicious mac and cheese ready to eat right out of the store! Please bring it back my cravings are hard core for this mac and cheese! Who is with me!? I have heard this mac and cheese was enjoyed by many! I called the deli department and talked to a lovely woman who told me she has gotten a lot of complaints about the switch from the white to yellow! (I did try the yellow, and it is not worth it) please help me bring this baby back!
column49: Bring back king Soopers white mac and cheese

column33: Cheers to bringing back Johnny Depps name!
column35: [' experienced a version of <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark>. I’ve seen how female abusers work. And male victims of', ', it was the way [<mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark>] used her claims to build a platform as an activist and the way she', ' was with her….Violence has no gender. All victims...survivors deserve to be <mark>heard</mark>…and anyone using', ' household, so when the accusations came out, I was like, “well…<mark>Amber</mark> isn’t acting like me…but Depp']
column39: Cheers to bringing back Johnny Depps name!
column46: Warner Bros Disney The jury : Cheers to bringing back Johnny Depps name!
column47:
In the sea of Amazing actors and actresses, Johnny Depp always always seems to break through the tide. He captures many eyes with his eccentric and unique characters, his charming charisma , and his contagious humour, which seems to ignite a spark of humbleness within us all.

His works like Public Enemies, Pirates of the Caribbean Series, Finding Neverland, dark Shadows, Sweeny Todd,Sleepy Hollow( I could go on) have shown his versatility and his great depths to which he can go and is praised all over the world. His ability to go to any extent for his characters, is just phenomenal.

You may not like the guy, but you can't deny he has skill and talent.

“With any part you play, there is a certain amount of yourself in it. There has to be, otherwise it’s just not acting. It’s lying”

What I admire most about Depp, is his commitment and dedication to his job. He doesn't treat it as a job, thus a different way of breathing. A different way of expression. He stands by the idea that " we are all somewhat screwy in a way" and that we should embrace our weirdness and imperfections.

I used to believe that i was insignificant. That I was made to feel different. Because I didn't dress a particular way, or I didn't think the 'right' way. But Johnny Depp made me feel that it was okay to be me.

He has inspired me to live my life to the full. With smiles and laughter and through enjoyment.

Please don't take him from our screens. Please don't take away the man that inspires me to not survive. But to live.

 

Johnny has brought nothing but happiness and joy to our hearts, innocence and clarity from our souls, and the laughter and smiles from our lips when we were sad.

He has touched my heart and opened my mind.

So please Don't crush his reputation , he is not a piece of dirt you can kick with your shoe, he is not a product of society. He is a man. With family,  with problems, and with a heart.


We should all be trying to work together , we all need to be little more understanding.


It is not good to be singled minded. For it means your mind is closed to other ideas or opinions. And if you are not open to any other ideas or opinions then you are intolerant of them. This is called bigotry. Bigotry is an ugly thing, and is often found alongside of other deplorable traits such as arrogance, conceitedness and narcissism.

It is much better to have an open mind, The best way to knowledge is to explore. As soon as you put the breaks on exploration, you are being single minded. All this does is slow down progress.

Life is not just seeing whats in front of you or hearing something from your next door neighbor. You have to delve in much deeper than that. I think it's time to look over the rainbow.

 

These are just a handful of 100 responses to why the public believe "Johnny Depp is innocent"

  • "Because as a male victim of abuse, seeing [Johnny Depp’s] reputation be ruined and stay ruined even after heaps of evidence came out showing that he was the victim, made me feel abandoned. I support [Johnny Depp] to show others like myself they’re not alone." — @lightrey
  • "Because I’ve experienced a version of Amber Heard. I’ve seen how female abusers work. And male victims of [Domestic Violence] deserve to be seen." — @m1che11ePearl
  • "It was obvious to me almost from the outset that her claims were questionable and that the media coverage was biased. The more facts emerged, the more strongly I felt a real injustice was being done. I was incensed by the media, in particular. Later, it was the way [Amber Heard] used her claims to build a platform as an activist and the way she was enabled by various organisations which I found disgraceful. She has exploited victims (and I am a [domestic violence] survivor myself) for personal gain & should be held accountable." — @redlikejungle
  • "Having been a victim myself….I could see [Johnny Depp’s] life coming out of his eyes when he was with her….Violence has no gender. All victims...survivors deserve to be heard…and anyone using important platforms to further themselves, are horrible". — @Farrartina1212
  • "I grew up in an abusive household, so when the accusations came out, I was like, “well…Amber isn’t acting like me…but Depp is”. It was so many social signs that I, myself, could relate to. How withdrawn he was…versus the OVER confidence she exuded. I related to him." — @lilyjane916


There are dozens more. These are just some of the voices that make up the choir of Johnny Depp’s online supporters. Survivors, fans , humans. They are individuals who took the time to dig beyond the headlines and media and surfaced saying, “something isn’t right.” They care!

You do not need to agree with them. You do not need to engage with them. But hearing them, listening to them, and trying for a moment to truly understand them, is a good place to start.

This is not only for Johnny, but for the men and who are suffering quietly, from abuse. No one should be made to feel worthless, or exploited unruly.

I assume the foundation of this idea comes from the belief that women have an easier time reporting, and expressing their situation because people are more accepting and helpful when it comes to them. Also, I often hear people say that men are humiliated and ashamed by being abused, as if women aren’t. That is offensive. It not only assumes that a woman’s right to control her own agency and life is somehow less potent, or less important than a man’s, it also assumes a woman has an easier time revealing her situation, because, well, women are simply allowed to seem weak.

It definitely happens. One reason it's less of a concern is because men are supposedly more capable of defending themselves and less likely to be injured.

I say “supposedly” because even though this is often physically true, men can get in a whole lot of trouble for defending themselves especially if they cause any injury to the woman in the process. He is a lot more likely to go to jail than she is EVEN IF she is the one who is doing the abusing. Now how is that fair. It isn't? But we can change that.

If that is the case, are you telling me that defending ones self is a crime if your a man?

 

 

Not only with this cruel disease that takes people's lives unwillingly, but I will not, let another disease  such as disregardence, be released.

 


Sign this Petition and let's help Johnny Depp get his name back . His career back, And most importantly, the smiles back on your children's faces.

With love and wishing you all the best in this weird world right now-
Maisy - Anne Clark
@clarkmaisy2004@gmail.com - enquiries

column39: REMOVE EZRA MILLER FROM FLASH
column46: Andy Muschietti (: REMOVE EZRA MILLER FROM FLASH
column47:
-Warner supports abusers and violent people, not just Amber Heard, who abused Johnny Depp. She also defends the fact that Ezra Miller suffocated a fan. Ezra is as violent as Amber. THEY DON'T DESERVE THOSE SUPERHERO ROLES.

At the beginning of April 2020, the actor Ezra Miller has become a trend on social networks due to a video that is circulating in which he attacks one of his followers in a bar in Ireland.

In the footage, the protagonist of the movie "The Advantages of Being Invisible" is seen wearing a red raincoat and outside the nightclub. At one point, Miller appeared to be pretending to be upset with a woman who smiles at him, but things got out of hand when he says, “Do you want to fight? Do you want to fight? "While taking her by the neck.

The actor grabs the woman tightly by the neck and tries to pull her down, at that moment the person recording the video tries to stop, yells at her to calm down and cuts the recording. What made it clear that Ezra was no longer a game was the reaction of the person documenting the situation, which ended up becoming very violent.

-Warner apoya a abusadores y personas violentas, no solo a Amber Heard, quien abusó de Johnny Depp. También defiende el hecho de que Ezra Miller asfixió a un fan. Ezra es tan violento como Amber. ELLOS NO MERECEN ESOS PAPELES DE SUPERHÉROE. 

A principios de abril de 2020 el actor Ezra Miller se ha vuelto tendencia en redes sociales debido a un video que se encuentra circulando en el que agrede a una de sus seguidoras en un bar de Irlanda.

En el material se ve al protagonista de la película “Las Ventajas de Ser Invisible” vistiendo una gabardina roja y en el exterior del local nocturno. En un momento, Miller parecería estar fingiendo estar molesto con una mujer que le sonríe, pero todo se fue de control cuando le dice “¿Quieres pelear? ¿Quieres pelear?" mientras la toma del cuello.

El actor agarra a la mujer fuertemente del cuello e intenta tirarla hacia abajo, en ese momento la persona que graba el video trata de deterno, le grita para que se calme y corta la grabación. Lo que hizo ver que lo de Ezra ya no era un juego fue la reacción de la persona que documentaba la situación, que terminó volviéndose muy violenta.

Lo que tiene que suceder es que le quiten el papel de Flash a Ezra Miller y le den ese papel a otro actor.

 

please SIGN!!! Porfavor FIRMA!!

column33: Johnny Depp as Ghost Rider in MCU
column35: [" <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark>, I would love to see him get back. Its about what's right. Marvel is one of the biggest"]
column39: Johnny Depp as Ghost Rider in MCU
column46: Marvel: Johnny Depp as Ghost Rider in MCU
column47: I love Ghost Rider ever since I read it. Nicolas Cage ruined the character for me but it was a relief that Marvel decided to shelf those movies. I always wanted to see Johnny Depp taking on the character of Johnny Blaze a.k.a Ghost Rider. Now that he is emerging from his life that was domestic violence and victim abuse, he needs to be seen in movies again. He deserves to be appreciated again. This is not about me fanboying about him. This is about feeling the pain for an innocent man. I feel for him. And I want him back for Jack Sparrow too. Everything that he ever had to let go because of Amber Heard, I would love to see him get back. Its about what's right. Marvel is one of the biggest names in Hollywood right now and if Depp is hired as the iconic Ghost Rider, Marvel would get yet another incredible actor on board and this would prove such a positive step in Depp's redeeming career.

column39: Justice for Child Homicide Cold Cases
column46: Justice for Child Homicide Cold Cases
column47:
According to Unicef, about 3,000 kids are murdered every year in the US. These children and their families deserve justice and shouldn't go through life wondering, while predators get away with the worst crime anyone can commit. Children are innocent, vulnerable, and easy targets for murders. It is our responsibility to protect children. Some of these world known child homicide cold cases include Caylee Anthony, Madeleine McCann, Amber Hagerman, and Jonbenet Ramsey. Looking deeply into these notorious cold cases have touched my heart. But there hundreds other children who's cases are never heard of. Who speaks for them?

Child predators are the worst, most horrible kind of human beings on earth. We must get them off the streets as they prowl among our beloved children. The men and women who commit these heinous crimes can live happy lives, yet they stole the life of a beautiful child.

Child homicide cold cases are the first that should be solved. Some cases are not even open and are forgotten about. With the help of the government, law enforcement, the FBI, and investigators, these cold cases need to be funded and looked over again until they are solved and justice is served. All criminals must give their DNA to be put into a database that can potentially link them to unsolved crimes they got away with. Stronger Child Protective Services, AMBER Alerts, and the Child Protection ACT enforcement can protect and prevent children from being neglected, abused, and murdered.

column39: Bring the Jenkins kids HOME
column46: Brian Kemp: Bring the Jenkins kids HOME
column47:
On March 27, Richmond County Sheriff's office barged into my home and took my 6 younger kids. My ex husband had obtained an emergency custody hearing based off lies, exagerations and fabricated stories. With the Corona virus and quarantine in effect our court date had been continued to be pushed back. My kids are now suffering and are traumatized. I need justice to be served and my children want to, and NEED to be brought home.

I divorced 2018. During the divorce there were numerous counts of infidelity, he was verbally abusive to myself and our kids and he was physically abusive to our children at times. He threatened for years if I left he would use his parents money to take my kids and make me miserable. After he sexually harassed my sister in 2017, I knew I had to leave no matter what he threatened. Since the divorce, he has become $9243.00 behind in child support. He has harassed my boyfriend and I, and sent many threats through the kids. He constantly spies on us, takes pictures, calls the county if I don't respond to texts within 45 mins, and calls CPS for things like the kids having to do chores etc. All of this I have solid evidence. I have tried to maintain peace, praying that he would just stop one day and we could co parent. It all finally came to a head a few month's ago when my boyfriend had an emotional breakdown, behind closed doors when we thought we were alone. My oldest daughter had stopped by and heard him yelling, she thought he was yelling at me, videoed and sent it to my sons, and texted me asking if I was ok. I told her he wasn't yelling at me, it was the situation with my ex and etc and everything was ok. We truly have had so much emotional strain brought on by my ex husband. We decided to focus on finding a more private home to make it harder for him to stalk us and we moved forward. It was an isolated incident. This video was sent to my ex husband by my oldest son(20) when I would no longer allow him in my home. He was mad and was out for revenge. This video, less than 2 minutes, has been used to depict who my boyfriend is as a person 24-7. We have tons of videos from the past 14 mths showing happy healthy kids, laughing freely and unafraid. We have stacks of character witnesses that can tell you who I am as a person and who Andrew is. We also have proof of abuse, and incestuous relationships, instability- for my ex husband. All has been offered to the Guardian Ad Litem, but she is only out to prove Andrew and I are monsters... Based off lies from an actual monster. He has tried to bring me down and destroy me since the divorce. He caused the family home to be foreclosed on, forcing myself and 7 kids on the street in hopes that I would take him back... After being a stay at home mom for 15 yrs, I figured out how to make enough income to support my family and I started my own cleaning business. I've supported my children and made a safe secure home for them. My ex husband has bounced from job to job while his mother supports him financially. I do not have the money to fight this, but I have the TRUTH. I need someone to hear me and SEE what he has done... And now because his mom is paying his legal fees its given his lies life. If u have any doubts, questions, want to know more, or want evidence, please email me anjenkinz09@gmail.com. please sign this position and pass it on. Together we can take my children out of a toxic environment and bring them home.

column11: Morley MLA Amber-Jade Sanderson, City of Bayswater, Legislative Council of Western Australia
column33: Allow the proposed telecommunications tower installation at Crimea Reserve, Bayswater
column35: [' reception and atrociously slow ADSL internet speeds. Time and time again we have <mark>heard</mark> that things']
column39: Allow the proposed telecommunications tower installation at Crimea Reserve, Bayswater
column46: Morley MLA Amber-Jade Sanderson: ALLOW the proposed telecommunications tower installation at Crimea Reserve, Bayswater
column47:
For too long now, the people of Morley have been living in a nightmare of incredibly poor mobile reception and atrociously slow ADSL internet speeds. Time and time again we have heard that things will improve, and yet still we are unable to do so much as send and receive text messages in our home. Our quality of life is being affected through loss of communication with our loved ones, and the feeling of social isolation in the modern world. Furthermore, with the NBN not scheduled to arrive in this small patch of Morley until late 2019, a reliable mobile connection is our last hope to escape these dark times.

Around 18 months ago the City of Bayswater voted to disapprove the installation of a 20 metre high telecommunications tower in Crimea Reserve. This tower would have also housed equipment for Vodafone and two other providers (likely Optus and Telstra), and therefore benefitted all mobile users. Common sense prevailed and the State Administrative Tribunal overruled the council's decision, however, unfortunately both the City of Bayswater and some residents are still actively opposing this tower's installation. Their latest attempt is to convince the state government that the SAT should not have the power to overrule council decisions.

I urge you to show your support for this project as the benefits are far reaching. Not only will this ease slow speeds and cellular congestion on surrounding towers, the rent paid by these telecommunications companies will directly benefit the City of Bayswater and its residents. We cannot let unfounded fears of radiation and progress continue to genuinely hinder the quality of life for those whom the tower would be a godsend.

I urge the City of Bayswater, the MLA for Morley, and the Legislative Council of Western Australia to do the following:

  • Immediately halt all actions that are delaying the installation of the proposed Vodafone Hutchinson telecommunications tower at Crimea Reserve, and reject all proposals for amendments to the powers of the State Administrative Tribunal on local government issues
  • Consider the benefits to all members of this community the tower would bring, and the negative effects continued protest will cause
  • Complete any and all actions required to expedite the installation and activation of this proposed tower.

Your signature could genuinely change our lives. Thank you for reading.

Myles

column33: Justice for Johnny Depp
column35: ['Johnny Depp got abused and destroyed by <mark>Amber</mark> Heards allegations and still he is the one losing', ' good hearted human being. It’s not fair. <mark>amber</mark> ADMITTED to abusing him and starting physical fights', ". It makes me absolutely livid knowing that he lost his case. I've <mark>heard</mark> tons of people say he was", " <mark>Amber</mark> when she confessed to abusing him and I didn't really see bruises with her. Except for one"]
column39: Justice for Johnny Depp
column46: Royal Courts of Justice: Justice for Johnny Depp
column47: Johnny Depp got abused and destroyed by Amber Heards allegations and still he is the one losing everything he has worked for. He is the victim. Disney has just announced he won't be returning for Piartes of the Caribbean, a franchise he has been carrying on his back since 2003.  Yet she is still allowed to keep all of her jobs.  It is not right and never will be.  You tell people to speak out and when they do stuff like this happens and people loose everything they have worked for. The fact that all his exes are coming forward to support him too and  people still dont believe him. Hes such a good hearted human being. It’s not fair. amber ADMITTED to abusing him and starting physical fights. It makes me absolutely livid knowing that he lost his case. I've heard tons of people say he was abusive towards her and I digged up some stuff and the makeup artist said they had to cover up bruises and then there's that whole thing with the judge but the hair stylist said they never saw bruises and so did friends so it's honestly just really complicated and annoying because people are believing Amber when she confessed to abusing him and I didn't really see bruises with her. Except for one picture and with Johnny there was multiple picture of bruises and bruises forming

column33: Keep Johnny Depp as Grindelwald
column35: [' brought forth courtesy of <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark>.\xa0\nWhen the news broke out, fans were in a very righteous uproar']
column39: Keep Johnny Depp as Grindelwald
column46: Warner Brothers: Keep Johnny Depp as Grindelwald
column47:
Johnny Depp was sadly forced to step down as our beloved Grindelwald in the Fantastic Beasts franchise. 

This was all done because he lost his case to clear his name, with proof, on the accusations brought forth courtesy of Amber Heard. 

When the news broke out, fans were in a very righteous uproar. Johnny Depp's career shouldn't be derailed under false pretenses. 

Only, I repeat, only Johnny Depp can pull off our beloved Fantastic Beasts villian Grindelwald. 

Johnny Depp is Grindelwald.

column33: Bring Johnny Depp Titles back to Netflix
column35: [" abuse arose, but the true fans weren't buying the false claims made by <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark>. Then in the end", ' flying. <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> was found guilty of her crimes against Johnny, but it seems as if she just']
column39: Bring Johnny Depp Titles back to Netflix
column46: Netflix: Bring Johnny Depp Titles back to Netflix
column47:
Johnny Depp has been apart of our lives since Nightmare on Elm Street. He has been on numerous movies over the span of three decades. From Pirates of the Caribbean, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Blow, the Secret Window, Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, Rum Diaries, Alice in Wonderland, Edward Scissorhands, Sweeney Todd, Sleepy Hollow, What's eating Gilbert Grape, and so many more. He has been part of our lives this entire time as a great character actor. As we know, several allegations of abuse arose, but the true fans weren't buying the false claims made by Amber Heard. Then in the end it was found out that they weren't true, but Johnny's character was already married by her false statements. Disney, being the greedy corporate conglomerates that they are, fired him. Now, Netflix and Starz have removed him from their platforms. As well as WB from the Fantastic Beasts movies. 

I am asking this petition be signed and spread around on every social media platform so we can bring Johnny back to his rightful place and he can resume his career in peace without slander and defamation flying. Amber Heard was found guilty of her crimes against Johnny, but it seems as if she just received a slap on the wrist. She is STILL starring in Aquaman. She has no care that she ruined a man's career with her lies. Bringing questions against the #metoo movement because of her false allegations and downplaying other traumas women have suffered within society. 

#justiceforjohnnydepp
column49: Bring Johnny Depp Titles back to Netflix

column33: Boycott Warner Media and Their Parent Company AT&T!
column35: [' fact that they have refused to acknowledge that by her own admission <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> has admitted to', ' but rather rely on the video taped confession of Ms <mark>Heard</mark> admitting that she assaulted her ex spouse']
column39: Boycott Warner Media and Their Parent Company AT&T!
column46: AT&T: Boycott Warner Media and Their Parent Company AT&T!
column47:
I am starting this petition with one goal in mind and that is to show these huge corrupt corporate entities that false virtue signaling and protecting domestic abusers must end. I am referring to fact that they have refused to acknowledge that by her own admission Amber Heard has admitted to abusing her former spouse on numerous occasions. I will not get into the details of he said she said but rather rely on the video taped confession of Ms Heard admitting that she assaulted her ex spouse not only with bare hands but with metal objects, ie pots and pans.

No one should be above the law and people that commit crimes against family shouldn't be protected and definitely not given major movie platforms. If we allow this kind of example to continue and influence our coming generations then we have failed our children.

We strive to live in an age were equality and the merrit of one's soul/character should be the most paramount but unfortunately we have large entities at play that would sacrifice all of this on the alter of the almighty dollar, so if the dollar is all they want and care about then let us all deprive them of this by refusing to buy or subscribe to their products. The only way they will learn is to hit them in the wallet and let them know that we are not going to sacrifice the world we wish to create for future generations just so they can false virtue signal and protect an admitted domestic abuser. We must be the change we wish to create and anyone willing to abuse the ones they claim love must be brought to justice no matter their sex or gender and those willing to prop them and give platforms to this kind of evil must not receive our hard earned dollar.
column49: Boycott Warner Media and Their Parent Company AT&T! Please stop giving a platform to this admitted abuser, this kind of example to our younger generation and to the public at large is unacceptable no matter the gender or sex of the offender
column148: Just a simple Throg trying to make my pond in the world just a little bit better. If you have some time please sign my petition to hold the corporate enablers of domestic abuse accountable at www.change.org/Boycott-corporate-enablers

column33: Men's rights and the injustices of the court and society
column35: ['. What about Johnny Depp, despite all of the evidence against <mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> of her abuse and lies']
column39: Men's rights and the injustices of the court and society
column46: California State Senate: Men's rights and the injustices of the court and society
column47:
I believe that men are discriminated against in court of law and society as well. We are suffering from the injustice of the law and prejudice. When we talk of the Men's right movement or anything of the sort, we are canceled and denied of any rights to our children, money, and justice in the court of law. This country is dying. This place is no place for a man to live, let alone survive.

Our own president, Joe Biden states that he will end due process for men on campus. A segment of The federalist states that, "Colleges are scrambling to avoid following new Title IX regulations requiring them to respect due process rights for those accused of sexual assault — rights Biden has promised to end if he's elected.". Such as system that can so easily be twisted to insidious means against men should not exist. The notion of false rape accusation is prevalent in this country, it is  beginning to become the norm. So is the unfairness of paternity court where women get the children and fathers must pay for child support even if the women cheated. Getting married has almost no benefits but have skyrocketed in the danger and financial loss. 

The unfairness is everywhere such as teachers being fired from college for say that men are not awful which is a article in the website, The Daily Mail. What about Johnny Depp, despite all of the evidence against Amber Heard of her abuse and lies, isn't punished for her actions.

How can we let such injustice go about and not do anything. Being a man is America is seen as a crime and I am tired of all of the injustice.
column49: Men's rights and the injustices of the court and society

column33: Johnny Depp for the next Sith Lord
column35: [' LIGHTSABER, WHICH IS AWESOME!\n<mark>Amber</mark> <mark>Heard</mark> framed Johnny Depp, so lets make sure he can still have his']
column39: Johnny Depp for the next Sith Lord
column46: Walt Disney: Johnny Depp for the next Sith Lord
column47:
To Be Honest with you all, I just wanna see Johnny Depp for the next sith lord.

nothing else, I just wanna see Johnny Depp up there on screen as a Main Character in the next Star Wars film.

Johnny Depp lost his job as an actor so lets get him his job back.

he was a great actor so lets just give him another part if he's up for it, if not, ah well.

call this a meme if you want, I'm being honest here, I wanna see Johnny Depp as the next powerful Sith lord, maybe a Palpatine or something.

the main reason of this is so that Johnny can get his job back if he needs to make some money.

we all feel bad for Johnny Depp after what happened, so lets get him back into the mood to act again! and lets give him a badass role!

his name will go down in Star Wars history, he'll be the next Darth Plagueis The Wise, every fan of FTB (Fantastic beats) or PTC (Pirates of The Caribbean) might join the Star Wars community, lets all band together and make this happen.

WHO KNOWS? WE MIGHT GET A NEW TYPE OF LIGHTSABER, WHICH IS AWESOME!

Amber Heard framed Johnny Depp, so lets make sure he can still have his fame, and not the frame.

I mean.. Johnny Depp might be down for this, so lets make this happen.

I want Johnny Depp to have Justice, and this is how we will give it!

(LETS MAKE HIM CANON!)

column39: SUPPORT MALE VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE BY NOT WATCHING AQUAMAN 2!
column46: The great men of the world!: SUPPORT MALE VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE BY NOT WATCHING AQUAMAN 2!
column47:
DO NOT WATCH AQUAMAN 2 IN SUPPORT OF MEN WHO ARE DOMESTICALLY ABUSED!

In today’s society we are faced with a number trivial disputes pushed into the limelight by social media. Social media has also been holding more and more individuals accountable for their actions. Now more than ever it is BEYOND IMPORTANT that we establish no matter what your race, religion, sexuality or gender is DOMESTIC VIOLENCE is UNACCEPTABLE. 

Johnny Depp, guilty or not, was abused by actress Amber Heard. She openly admitted to abusing him on recordings.  She complained about Johnny Depp running away from her. I don’t know about you, but when you are abused you don’t want to be around them. Her story is not congruent. Yet, even with testimony disputing what she claims, Johnny Depp is held accountable. Johnny Depp is removed from roles  on the word of Amber Heard. Even after proving that the relationship itself was toxic and she abused him in some ways as well, she has suffered little to no real consequences for her actions. An abuser is an abuser.

Amber Heard has admitted to her abuse of Johnny Depp on recordings she made herself. Vanessa Parody, Winona Ryder, Sharon Osborn, Mickey Rourke, Penelope Cruze, Javier Bardem, Sia and other came to Johnny Depp’s defense. Amber Heard needs to be healed accountable in the name of equality! MEN CAN BE ABUSED TOO! This situation will show men everywhere that they cannot tell others about the abuse they suffered and that they won’t be believed. Men will continue to suffer in silence as they are vilified.

DO NOT WATCH AQUAMAN 2 IN SUPPORT OF MEN WHO ARE DOMESTICALLY ABUSED!

column39: Tow Operators Lives Matter
column47:
Here is a petition to help protect tow truck operators in illinois. if you haven't heard by now, on sunday sept. 20,2015,
we lost a fellow brother on i-55 nb mm 118 , he was struck by a semi that failed to move over for a tow truck that had his amber rotators on, we are working with Rep. Tim Butler to help get the laws changed in illinois so that tow companies can run red and/or blue lights., due to the public associate amber's to construction / road workers, as well as any one can go to walmart, or any auto parts store and get amber warning lights. Please Help Us Get The Laws Changed To Protect Tow Operators in Illinois.
# Tow Truck Operators Lives Matter!

column33: Update our Political Operating System
column35: [', would all receive an alert notification similar to the ones received for <mark>amber</mark> alerts. Everyone could', ' <mark>heard</mark> some refuse this idea on grounds that it may damage our economy, but let me explain something']
column39: Update our Political Operating System
column46: U​.​S. House of Representatives: Update our Political Operating System
column47:
In this digital age, it is a simple fact that Information Technology must be kept up to date in order to effectively manage the ever increasing amount of data and system resources. Why did it become so important to continually update our operating systems? Because people figured out how to exploit and take advantage of less secure, less advanced systems.

While it may seem like commom sense to update our operating systems regularly, somehow we have left our most important global opersting system more than 200 years in the past. Our Legislative, Federal, and Executive branches of government.

When the Founding Father's drafted the Constitutional Declaration of Independance, they did so with the intention of establishing true equality for all, giving everyone an equal voice in establishing and maintaining the laws of the land. The intention was to create a True Democracy. But due to physical limitations, representatives were elected to bring their local countrymen's concerns to congress. This system has since grown corrupt as populations exceeded the capacity to effectively communicate to their "representative", and those so called "representatives" were allowed to be "lobbied" or purchased by corporate wealth. And unless those "Representatives" play the game, they do not receive the political platform that has power to make any changes. These corporations further corrupted the process as they are the only ones with the power to lobby representatives against the public. This only removes the power from the people even further.

The system as it currently stands, is bassackwards; currently being controlled and dictated by corporations, while the publics act as the unconscious gears and cogs spinning fees, rents, dues, and subscriptions to bring it all to pass. In Truth, the People are the higher power. And the government is meant to be of the people, by the people, and for the people--not of corporstions, by corporations, and for corporations.

In order to remedy this, and to combat corporate control/corruption, I suggest that we do as the Founding Father's intended, which is to create a true democracy in equality, via social media technology. We need to update our old 'U.S. 1776 firmware' to something more modern, and less prone to insider exploitation. It requires greater checks and balances than what currently exists, because every political position in thise balances, have already been pruned to exchange individual moral integrity, for that career advancement.

Instead of letting lobbied, purchased, inside traders dictate tax dollars to be spent on wars and war machines, lets see if the public would rather waste those trillions on bombs, weather modification, and satelite programs, or if theyd rather vote to use those trillions to give themselves free solar power, free urban agricultural development, homestead development incentives, terraforming, etc. Such would establishing the greatest freedom, liberty, and equality that history has ever known.

The application is infinite in its design possibilities, as onky limited by the individuals imagination.

For instance, there could be a publicly accessible chronological archive of laws, bills, and policies passed that could be searched through, and if someone discovered a corruption that undermines the public, it could be flagged for redress bringing it to the attention of everyone within the affected principality.

There would be progressive platforms of communication: originating at the neighborhood/community level, to city, county, state, national, and someday even international. Though each platform would be accessible to everyone, suggestions for chanhe would occur on the closest local platform, and be pushed up through the tiers as ratification increases.

Any time a law, bill, or policy is brought forth for discussion, depending on the principality involved, that entire body of people, whether it be local neighboring community, county, city, state, national, or international, would all receive an alert notification similar to the ones received for amber alerts. Everyone could then pull up the indicated legislature and read through a shorthand summary, as well as the longhand legal form if so desired. At the bottom of the page would be an option to vote, along with a comment box explaining why you feel that way, and once submitted, it would display a real-time live fluctuation pie graph, tallying the votes of everyone in yes, no, and other. Each section of the pie graph could be selected and expand to reveal the comments of everyone who voted that particular way, explaining their reasoning why. People could then self educate by indulging in their favorite passtime--reading the comment section, and could even discuss it with anyone they come in contact with throughout their day/week. In doing so, we would be unified together as a singular body, and we could begin to behave as One.

There could be a grace period invented in which people could adjust their vote after informing themselves by reading the comments or discussion it with friends, but once the period is over, that bill or law would be passed onto the federal and executive branches which they are then required to abide/enfirce as an extension of the public voice.

Instead of a once a year ballot of rigged multiple choices, we close the gap of broken communication by allowing immediate daily involvement.

There could include a section devoted to suggesting/choosing ways for individual taxes to be spent which can be divided at individual discretion. Ie: (x% national debt reclaim; free solar installation; sustainable urban agricultural developments; national/international aid for disaster relief, etc., while small percentages of 5% and under, are required for applicable welfare programs.

Ive heard some refuse this idea on grounds that it may damage our economy, but let me explain something. Corporations have done everything in the power to create public dependancy upon them through subscriptions, premiums, insurances, unsustainable utilities, and every policy that can be invented to funnel the wealth of the public back into private corpoate pockets. Once its in the pockets of the wealthy, it tends to stay there, having been removed from economic circulation. As a result, our economy suffers as the working class and under struggle to make their ends meet and cant afford to spend extracurricularly. But if the general public was liberated from unnecessary utility, food/shelter/rental/insurance costs, etc. That would mean more money in the pocket of the individual which could then be recirculated into the economy, increasing the buying power of the dollar instead of being hoarded by the top 1 percent of the world devaluing the currency.

This all would be done in order to wrest back control from the hands of corruption, and to put the power back into individually soverign hands. To give the power back to God, who's government this is. Such would end the reign of corruption and begin the millenial reign of Consciousness over this country, and then over the entire earth as everyone else would follow suit.

This is the ONLY way to fix the disconnected corruption of government that is being experienced in every country. It is the ONLY way to truly Unify everyone as a singular body while honoring the individual's inalienable rights to life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness.

And i guarantee that every single person in the 1 percent/ruling class would veto this proposition because they are the ones currently profiting on the broken and outdated operating system. They are aware that this would take away all the power theyve wrested for thenselves, which is why they do all they can to divide and degregate the people into fictional boundaries. The final battle over this earth, is between the corrupt corporations/governments, and a Consciously United people.

column33: Bring Wizard Smith to the Mainland!
column35: ['For too long have those godless Tasmanian sons of devils withheld their <mark>amber</mark> delight from all of', " liquid wonder that they're keeping to themselves. You probably haven't even <mark>heard</mark> of it, such is their"]
column39: Bring Wizard Smith to the Mainland!
column46: Boag's Brewery: Bring Wizard Smith to the Mainland!
column47:
For too long have those godless Tasmanian sons of devils withheld their amber delight from all of us proper Australians. Instead they ship barrels of tainted dregs in the form of James Boags Premium Lager with the same conniving sarcasm of a relative who gifts you things they got for free in lieu of actual birthday presents.

It's time for us to bring justice to this cold, dead country. They're holding out on us. They have fancy ale, my brothers and sisters. They have delicious, shimmering liquid wonder that they're keeping to themselves. You probably haven't even heard of it, such is their dirty, unpatriotic conspiracy.

What have we, as Australians, but a common spirit of mateship that forbids such treachery? Think of everything that we do for them. All the sports teams we let them borrow, all the funny and friendly jokes about incest with which we graciously furnish them. Do we refuse them XXXX and VB and Carlton Draught? Of course not. We understand what this country is about. 

The greatest taboo on this great southern would be to invite your mates over and suffer them to Aldi beer, while you sucked down your secret stash of special liquor that's just for you. And that's what Tasmania has been doing to the rest of us for decades.

THIS ENDS NOW.
